column2: Uganda: Uwigize umuhanuzi w'idini yakubise abayoboke yapfunzwe
column3: Umugabo wo muri Uganda yigize umuhanuzi w'idini yagirijwe ivyaha vyo guhohotera no gukora urudandaza rw'abantu. Umuhanuzi Kintu Dennis w’ishengero Hoima Empowerment Church International yabonetse muri video yarabwe cane ariko arakubita inkoni abayoboke b’ishengero ryiwe. Igipolisi cafashe uwo mugabo w’imyaka 42 kuwa gatatu w’ino ndwi ari kumwe n’abandi bayoboke b’iryo shengero bane nyuma y’aho iyo video yitwariwe. Afatwa amasanamu ariko arategeka abakozi bo mw’ishengero ngo baje imbere y’isengero bakubitwe canke bahebe kugaruka mu masengesho bace banatakaza amahirwe yo gukora kuri microphone yiwe. Ico gihe cose, abaje gusenga bagumye barorera mu gihe abo bakozi baza barakubitwa umwe inyuma y’uwundi hariko haravuga akaziki koroheje ka piano. Umuhanuzi Kintu yabariye abakora itohoza ko yariko arasubiramwo ivyo Yezu yakoze, igihe yasanga abantu bariko baradandariza mw’isengero, nk’uko biri mu rwandiko rw’igipolisi. Abajejwe intwaro kandi bavuga yuko yayobora iryo shengero atavyemerewe n’amategeko. Ugusaka kwakozwe m’iryo sengero kwatoye inkoni zitatu igipolisi kivuga yuko ari zo zakoreshwa mu gukubita abayoboke. Kintu Dennis yagumijwe mw’ibohera gushika itari indwi Nyakanga (9). Uganda ifise amashengero menshi ya gi-Kristu akorera hose mu gihugu. Ntagenzurwa kandi menshi muri yo atwarwa n’abagabo canke abagore biyita intumwa z’Imana.

column2: Akon-Uganda : Rurangiranwa muri rap Aliaune Thiam muri Uganda kurondera aho ashora imitahe
column3: Prezida Yoweri Museveni wa Uganda yatangaje ko yanezerewe no kuba yavuganye na Akon mu rugendo arimwo muri ico gihugu. Akon, izina ryiwe ry'ukuri ari Aliaune Thiam, muri urwo rugendo  muri Uganda ari kumwe n'umugore wiwe Rozina Negusei. Yandika ku rubuga rwa twitter, umukuru wa Uganda, Yoweri Museveni,   yavuze ati: "Aliaune Thiam @Akon n'umugore wiwe baje muri Uganda kurondera aho boshora imitahe mu bisata bitandukanye birimwo ivy'umuyagankuba [amashanyarazi] n'iterambere ry'ibikorwa remezo. "Ndanezerewe no kuba twagiraniye ibiganiro bizoteza imbere abanya Uganda na Africa muri rusangi." Aliaune Thiam azwi cane nka Akon, n'umunyatugenegene akaba n'umuririmvyi w'umudiho wa rap azwi cane. Yavukiye muri Amerika ku bavyeyi bakomoka muri Senegal ariko yarabaye cane muri ico gihugu co  muri Africa y'uburengero. Thiam afise imigambi itandukanye y'iterambere muri Senegal nyene no mu bindi bice vya Afrika. Akon, w'imyaka 47, yatanguye kumenyekana  ku rukurikirane rwiwe rwa mbere rw'indirimwo mu 2004. Mu ndirimbo ziwe harimwo  nka  "Smack That"  igaragaramwo umuririmvyi wa rap Eminem.

column2: Tanzania: Patiri imbere y'ubutungane yagirizwa vya mfura mbi yakoreye abana
column3: Umupatiri wa Ekleziya Katolika mu buraruko bwa Tanzania yarengukishijwe imbere y’ubutungane yagirizwa ivya mfura mbi yakoreye abana, nk’uko bivugwa n’igipolisi. Aba bana ni abanyeshure bo kuva mu mwaka wa gatandatu gushika mu mwaka wa mbere w’ishure ryisumbuye bariko bitegurira gusangira, abandi gukomezwa. Umunyamabanga mukuru w’Inama nkuru y’Abepiskopi muri Tanzania, Patiri Charles Kitima, avuga ko Ekleziya izokorana n’ababijejwe kugira ngo ubutungane bukore muri uru rubanza. Patiri Kitima ati: “Twavuze ko turindiriye iyo ngingo [ya sentare] kugira ngo izindi ngingo zifatwe...ivyemezo ni bitangwe hanyuma nawe ahabwe akaryo ko kwiregura, ico nico turindiriye. “Ni ngombwa ko amategeko akora igikorwa cayo kandi Ekleziya izokwifatanya n’ababijejwe kugira ngo abakorewe ikibi batunganirizwe”. Patiri Kitima yabwiye BBC ko muri rusangi Ekleziya Katorika irwanya ihohotera rishingiye ku gitsina rikorerwa abana kuko isengero ritegerezwa kuba ikibanza c’amahoro kuri bose. Ati: “Reka twemere ko iki ari ikibazo kijanye na kamere ya nyene kubikora, dufise abapatiri barenga 3.000 muri kino gihugu ariko muri bo harimwo abo usanga bafise utunenge n’intege nke, ivyo bibaho”. Patiri Kitima avuga ko iki ari akabi kabishe kuko gituma abavyeyi n’abana bagira impungenge nyinshi, abana iyo bagiye mu bikorwa nk’ivyo baba bizeye ko bagiye guhura n’umuntu yari kubarera muri mutima. Ati: “Rero iyo bakorewe ibitabajanye ni ibintu bibabaza cane. “Twebwe nka Ekleziya turababazwa n’ingeso mbi z’umuntu umw’umwe ziteye kubiri kubiri n’ico twategerezwa kwubaka, kwubaka umuntu mu mico myiza. “Ureste ko iki ari igicumuro kandi kibabaza Imana, gifise n’ingaruka mbi ku bana, rero ni ngombwa ko hafatwa ingingo ruhasha”. Patiri Kitima avuga ko kw’isi abantu nk’abo bahari, ko rero dutegerezwa gufashanya nk’abanya muryango mu guhindura izo ngeso, kandi tugatanga inkuru iyo hari ikintu nk’iki kibaye. Avuga ko uburyo bwo gutanga inkuru muri Ekleziya butomoye, kuva hasi gushika hejuru ku Nama nkuru y’abepiskopi, abantu b’abahinga mu gutorera inyishu ibibazo nk’ivyo.

column2: China: Rurangiranwa mu kuvuza piano Li Yundi yapfunzwe yagirizwa kugura imaraya
column3: Rurangiranwa mu kuvuza piano mu Bushinwa, Li Yundi, apfunzwe azira gusambana n'imaraya, nk'uko bivugwa n'ikinyamakuru ca reta. Ku rubuga hwaniro, igipolisi canditse ko umugabo w'imyaka 39 hamwe n'imaraya y'imyaka 29, bemeye ko bakoze ibintu bitemewe n'amategeko. Bafashwe inyuma y'aho abanyagihugu batangiye iyo nkuru ku bategetsi. Mu gihe igipolisi kitashize ahabona izina ryiwe, ikinyamakuru ca reta mu nyuma cemeje ko ari Li. Iyo nkuru yababaje abakunzi benshi b'uwo mugabo azwi kw'izina rya "China Piano Prince". Ku myaka 18, Li yabaye umuntu wa mbere akiri muto avuza piano - ahawe agashimwe ka mbere gakomeye mpuzamakungu ka Chopin Piano Competition mu 2000. Yabandanije avuza piano hirya no hino kw'isi, akaba n'umuntu azwi cane mu bantu bavuga ururimi rw'igishinwa. Umuntu umwe yanditse ku rubuga hwaniro rwa Weibo rumeze nka Twitter ati:"Mana yanje, biratangaje. Uyu ni Li Yundi twese dutangarira?" Abandi berekana amakenga ku kuntu yafashwe. Undi yanditse ngo:"Mfise amakenga yo kumenya ingene abantu bamenye ko ari we. Ubonye umugabo w'imyaka 39 n'umugore w'imyaka 29 binjiye mu nzu bari kumwe, bigenda gute ngo abantu bamenye ko ari imaraya, na we ari umukiriya wiwe?" Inyuma y'aho iyo nkuru imenyekaniye, ishirahamwe ry'abanyamuziki mu Bushinwa ryavuze ko rigiye kwaka ubunywanyi Li kuko "atanga isura mbi cane mu bantu". Bamwe mu baraba ibintu n'ibindi bavuga ko ipfungwa ryiwe rishobora gufatwa nk'igabishwa ku nyifato mbi y'abandi ba rurangiranwa mu gihe Ubushinwa bwahagurukiye abakora akazi kerekeye umuziki. Mu mategeko yo mu Bushinwa, abasambana canke bagurisha imaraya bashobora gupfungwa gushika ku misi 15 bakanatangisha n'amande ashobora gushika ku madolari ya amerika 782.

column2: Kurungika impunzi mu Rwanda: Sentare y’Ubwongereza yemeje urugendo rw’indege ku wa kabiri
column3: Sentare nkuru yafashe ingingo ko urugendo rw’indege itegekanijwe gukura abasaba ubuhungiro mu Bwongereza ibatwara mu Rwanda ku wa kabiri rubandanya ukuri kwaye. Abarwanya uwu mugambi bananiwe mu rugamba rwa mbere rwo guhagarika uwu mugambi wo kurungika abantu mu Rwanda, ariko bemeza ko bazokwungururiza urubanza muri sentare y’iyungururizo ku wa mbere. Muri uwu mugambi, bamwe mu binjira mu Bwogereza badakurikije amategeko bazokwungururirzwa mu Rwanda kugira ngo basabeyo ubuhungiro. Abashika 31 niba bamaze kubwirwa ko bazokwurizwa iyi ndege ya mbere. Hazoba umwihwezo wimbitse aho sentare nkuru y’igihugu izokwumviriza ibishikirizwa n’abarwanya uwu mugambi muri rusangi imbere y’impera za Mukakaro (7). Mu ngingo yiwe, umucamanza Swift  yemeye ko harimwo “inyungu z’abanyagihugu” mu gihe umushikiranganji w’intwaro yo hagati Priti Patel  yoshobora gushira mu ngiro uwu mugambi. Umushikiranganji Patel arashimagiza ingingo y’uyu mucamanza, akavuga ko reta izobandanya n’uwu mugambi, mu gihe umushikiranganji wa mbere Boris Johnson avuga ko iyi ngingo ari “inkuru nziza”. Hagati aho, abarwanya uwu mugambi buguruje uru rubanza bavuga ko bafise amakenga ku mutekano w’abantu bitezwe “kurungikwa ku nguvu”. Iyi ngingo ije mu gihe ikinyamakuru Times kivuga ko Umuganwa wa Wales ku giti ciwe anegura iyi ngingo ya reta – kigasubiramwo amajambo yiwe aho avuga ko iyi nzira “iteye ubwoba”. Umuganwa Charles niwe yiteze guserukira Umwamikazi mw’ikoraniro ry’ishirahamwe Commonwealth ryitezwe kubera ku mugwa mukuru w’Urwanda, Kigali, muri kuno kwezi. Ibiro vyiwe bishimangira ko abandanya “kutagira aho ahagaze muri poritike”. Reta yizeye ko uwu mugambi uzohagarika abarondera ubuhungiro kujabuka umuhora w’Ubwongereza, mu kwerekana neza ko ibibazo vyinshi bizokwigwa n’Urwanda. Abarenga 10.000 nibo bafashe uru rugendo rwo mu mazi ruteye ubwoba muri uno mwaka gushika ubu. Abarwanya uwu mugambi bari barondeye guhagarika urugendo rw’iyi ndege izokwunguruza aba bantu. Urubanza rwashinzwe n’abashingwamanza baserukira aba basaba ubuhungiro bitezwe kurungikwa mu Rwanda, hamwe na sendika  Public and Commercial Services union (PCS) – iserukira abarenga 80% y’abakozi bose b’igisata c’Ubwongereza kijejwe imbibe – hamwe n’amashirahamwe yitaho abimukira Care4Calais na Detention Action.  Abanyamategeko bayo berekana impungenge bafise ku bijanye n’utunenge turi mu ntunganyo y’igisata kijejwe impunzi mu Rwanda be n’uko bishoboka ko abantu bashobora kurungikwa mu bihugu bashobora gutoterezwamo – ico bita kwirukana (refoulement). Abanyamategeko b’Ubushikiranganji bw’intwaro yo hagati mu Bwongereza babwiye sentare ko umugambi udashobora guhagarikwa n’abawurwanya baciye muri sentare kubera ari ku nyungu z‘igihugu, baca basaba kandi umucamanza gutesha agaciro ibirego bishikirizwa kw’izina ry’abasaba ubuhungiro ku giti cabo. Muri urwo rubanza, ishami rya ONU ryitaho impunzi, UNHCR, naryo nyene ryamenyesheje ko ryitandukanije n’uwu mugambi. Abashingwamanza ba UNHCR bavuga kandi ko bagabishije ubushikiranganji bw’intwaro yo hagati ko iyi nteguro n’Urwanda iteye kubiri n’amategeko. Mu ngingo yiwe, umucamanza Swift yatesheje agaciro ibirego vy’abashaka guhagarika vy’agateganyo indege zizokwunguruza aba bantu imbere y’uko uru rubanza rwihwezwa neza muri Mukakaro. Avuga ko atigeze abona ko hari ibimenyetso vyerekana ko hashobora kuba "ihohotera, ukwirukanwa” canke ikindi kintu cose kibangamira uburenganzira bwabo nk'uko biri mu ngingo ya gatatu y'itegeko ryerekeye uburenganzira bwa muntu mu Bwongereza. Ingingo ya gatatu ikingira abantu iyicarubozo, gufatwa nabi nk’ikiremwamuntu, no kwirukanwa canke kurungikwa mu gihugu aho bishobora gushika umuntu akaborezwa igufa canke agafatwa nabi. Umucamanza Swift avuga ko bimwe mu birego bitangwa n’abashaka kuzibira izi ndege za mbere bivuga cane cane ko ingingo ya Patel “yo gufata Urwanda nk’igihugu gitekanye idafise ishingiro kandi ko ishingiye ku matohoza adakwiye”. Avuga ko iki kirego, co kimwe n’ibindi biri muri uru rubanza, bishobora kwigirwa hamwe n’ivyemezo mu gihe iyi ngingo izokwihwezwa mu buryo bwimbitse  - mu kiringo c’imisi ibiri imbere y’uko ukw’indwi kurangira. Ariko, umucamanza Swift asigura ko, n’aho abarwanya uwu mugambi bari bafise ivyemezo bihagije vy’uko uwu mugambi wokwihwezwa neza, ivyo bavuga “si ibintu bikomeye cane”. Inyuma y’iyi ngingo ya sentare, umushikiranganji Patel yavuze ko reta “izobandanya” n’uwu mugambi. Avuga ati: “Abantu bazoguma bagerageza kurondera no guhagarika irungikwa ryabo bifashishije amasentare n’ibibazo baserura ku munota wa nyuma, ariko ntiturora dutezura mu guhagarika iyi magendo y’abantu ihitana abatari bake no mu kurokora ubuzima. “U Rwanda ni igihugu gitekanye kandi giherutse no kwizerwa ko gitanga ubuhungiro bwiza – tuzobandanya twitegurira urugendo rwa mbere rugana mu Rwanda, hamwe n’izindi ngingo zose zitari nke zifise intumbero yo kugabanya amato mato mato yinjira”. Umushikiranganji wa mbere Jonhson yacishije ubutumwa bwiwe ku rubuga rwa Twitter avuga ati: “Ntidushobora kwemera ko abakora magendo y’abantu bata mu kaga ubuzima kandi incuti zacu kw’isi zizofasha mu guhagarika uru rudandaza rw’izi nkozi z’ikibi ruburakigongwe”. James Wilson, icegera c’ishirahamwe Detention Action rirwanya uwu mugambi, avuga ko yababajwe n’iyi ngingo. Clare Moseley, yatanguje Care4Calais avuga ko ishirahamwe ryiwe “rifise impungenge nyinshi ku bijanye n’imibereho y’abantu bashobora gutwarwa ku nguvu mu Rwanda, ingingo ishobora kubangamira cane ubuzima bwabo bwo mu mutwe na kazoza”. Inyuma y’iyi ngingo ya sentare, sendika PCS isaba ko hoba ibiganiro vyihuta n’umushikiranganji Patel kugira ngo bihweze uwu mugambi wo kwimura abantu.

column2: Burundi-CVR: 'Nimba ukuri ari ukuje gutera indyane mu gihugu, ntaco kwoba kumaze', Ndayishimiye
column3: Perezida Evariste Ndayishimiye avuga ko mu gihe "ukuri kwoza gutuma mu gihugu haduka indyane twopfuma tuguheba", yabivugiye mu kiganiro yahaye abanyagihugu kuri uyu wa gatatu, aho yasiguye yongera yishura ku bibazo bitari bike bijanye n'ubuzima bw'igihugu. Asigura ibijanye n'ukumenya ukuri ku bwicanyi bwabaye mu 1972-73, Perezida Ndayishimiye avuga ko "kumenya ukuri atari ikibazo", ko ahubwo "kwodufasha kwubaka akahise kacu, abana bacu baze bamenye ikizira n'ikitazira". Ati: "Turi mu bihe vy'ukumenya ukuri, ariko rero, …ni kwaba uko kuri ari ukuje gutuma indyane ziba mu gihugu, uko kuri ntaco kwoba kumaze". Haciye imisi umurwi ujewe kumenya ukuri n'ukunywanisha mu Burundi,  CVR,   utangaje ko ubwicanyi bwabaye mu 1972-1973 ari "ihonyabwoko ryakorewe Abahutu", ivyateye impari mu Barundi bamwe bamwe, bavuga ko ico cegeranyo gifise aho gihengamiye canke ko bimwe mu bikivugwamwo ari "ikinyoma". Ku bwa Perezida Ndayishimiye, iyo ukuri kumaze kuboneka haba hasigaye ingene igihugu kigukoresha. Ati: "Mugabo rero hariho abandi baca basimba, bagaca barondera ingene bagukoresha, ivyo bijejwe inzego z'igihugu, zozo zizomenya ingene zigukoresha ziravye ico abenegihugu bazovuga". Yemerera Abarundi ko indongozi zizotegerezwa gukora uko zishoboye kwose "kugira ngo uko kuri kutwubake, kwubake kazoza k'Uburundi, gukure ivyo kwihorana". Akebura ko mu gihe ukuri kutamenyekanye bishobora gutuma ubwicanyi bubandanya. "Dutegerezwa kumenya ko kwica ari icaha gikomeye cane, hanyuma tukakirwaniriza hamwe. Rero uko kuri nti kuje kudusambura, kuje ahubwo kutwubaka". Ku bijanye n'ico cegeranyo ku bwicanyi bwa 1972-73, Perezida Ndayishimiye avuga ko cashikirijwe inama nshingamateka, iyi nayo ikazogishikana mu rwego nshingwabikorwa rw'igihugu, na rwo ruheze rwiture abize amategeko kugira  bagice irya n'ino, kugira bemeze niba ari icaha mpuzamakungu n'abagikoze. Ku bafise ubwoba kuri iki cegeranyo, Perezida Evariste avuga ati: "Abarundi ni tuve mu bishobisho, nta bwoko bwagize jenoside mu Burundi, nta bwoko bwagize icaha c'ihonyabwoko mu Burundi". Ku bwa Perezida Ndayishimiye, bamwe mu Barundi bafise ubwoba kuko hamye ingeso yo kujaniranya, hakaba abitirira ikibi kanaka ubwoko kanaka "nk'uko umengo cari igihugu kitagira ubutegetsi". Evariste Ndayishimiye yemeza ko ubutegetsi bw'ico gihe ari bwo bubazwa ubu bwicanyi buteye impari. Ati: "Nta muntu n'umwe yonsigurira ingene hoba umurwi w'abantu wogenda ukagandagura abantu ibihumbi n'ibihumbi, ntihagire ico ubutegetsi bukora ataco buwuziko". "Ni twemere neza ko ubutegetsi bw'igihugu bw'ico gihe bwamenje". Avuga ko bamwe mu bari muri bwo batanze ukuri barashinga intahe y'ukuntu vyagenze. Nayo ku bavuga ko ishirahamwe ONU ari ryo ryoba rifise ububasha bwo kwemeza icaha ca jenoside, Perezida Ndayishimiye avyamirira kure kuko "nta na hamwe vyanditse". "Igitabo mpanavyaha c'Uburundi, kirahana neza ivyaha vy'ihonyabwoko, amakungu si yo mucamanza w'Uburundi, ONU si reta y'Uburundi". "Icaha ca jenoside cemezwa n'amategeko mpanavyaha y'Uburundi". Abajijwe nimba abanyaporitike bahunze bagirizwa amabi bashobora kugirirwa ikigongwe, Perezida Ndayishimiye, avuga y'uko bizovana n'ingene igihugu gishobora kuvyakira. Ati: "Igihe Papa Johani Paulo wa kabiri bamurasa, uwamurashe yaramugiriye ikigongwe, mbere araja no kumuraba aho abohewe, ariko ntiyaciye ataha, igihugu nticaciye kimugirira ikigongwe. "Burya rero ibijanye n'ikigongwe, ubanza kuraba ingene igihugu kivyakira, nimba agatima k'ubukoko karavuye muri uyo muntu, kandi nimba ashobora gusubira mu bandi agatekana neza. "Mwarabonye abantu bagiriwe ikigongwe mu baheruka, ubwo nyene baca basubira kwica abantu, basubira gufatwa baja mu gasho. None nk'abo bantu wumva tutagize amakosa kubarekura?" Abajijwe ku bivugwa vy'uko urwego rujejwe igendereza ruhohotera abantu, mbere hakaba hari n'uwuherutse kuhasiga ubuzima, Perezida Evariste Ndayishimiye nawe avuga ko uwabikoze yamenje kandi ko ategerezwa guhanwa. Avuga ko abakora ivyo bintu bashobora kuba bari muri ba bantu "baja gukora mu mabanga y'igihugu bafise inzigo", bafitiye akarigangamuhogo  abantu. Ati: "Muhora mwumva abapolisi bafata abantu bakabapfunga muri weekend kugira bazorekurwe ku wa mbere. Hariho Abarundi bagifise agakoko mu mitima". Mu misi iheze, hari umunywanyi w'umugambwe CNL yafashwe yagirijwe gutunga inkoho, arasinzikarizwa ubuzima gushika aritaba Imana. Evariste Ndayishimiye avuga ko yababajwe n'urupfu rwiwe, kandi ko uwabikoze yafashwe kugira ashiwe imbere y'ubutungane. "Uyo muntu yamuhohoteye yaramenje kandi ategerezwa guhanwa bimwe vy'akarorero. Ntituzokwihanganira na rimwe umuntu uwo ari we wese azohohotera uwundi, n'aho azoba yakoze ikibi, agateka kiwe kaguma kubahiriwa". Nayo ku kibazo c'abanyuruzwa, Perezida Ndayishimiye avuga ko bikorwa n'akarwi k'inkozi z'ikibi kihaye kwama gatuntuza abarundi. Avuga ko bariko barahiga abagize ako karwi "kandi hari abamaze gufatwa muri bo, mbere dusanga harimwo n'umupolisi". Avuga ko abakora ubwo bubisha ari ababá bashaka kwerekana ko ubutegetsi bw'igihugu ari bwo bunyuruza abantu. Ati: "Nico gituma ubona baca bahindukiza, ngo ni uburongozi bw'igihugu. None Uburongozi bw'igihugu bwoba ari bwo bwabikoze bugaca buja guhiga abo bantu?"

column2: Papa Francis ati: 'Imana idukunda twese, n’aho woba uri umunyakibi ruhebwa'
column3: Papa Francis yahimbaje umunsi mukuru wa Noel avuga ko Imana idukunda twese - "Ninkozi z'ibibi ruhebwa". Yashikirije iryo jambo imbere y'abantu ibihumbi n'ibihumbi bari mu gisabisho c'ijoro rya Noel kw'isengero rikuru i Vaticano ryitiriwe Umutakatifu Petero. Ati: "Ufise kuba  uri mu vyiyumviro bibi, ufise kuba warakoze ibi ruhebwa…ariko Imana ibandanya igukunda". Hari bamwe babona ko yashikirije ayo majambo afatiye ku mabi yagirizwa bamwe mu barongoye Ekleziya Katolika, harimwo ibijanye n'ugufata ku nguvu, nk'uko bishikirizwa n'umumenyeshamakuru wa BBC. Mu masaha yo ku mugoroba, Papa Francis aza gusubira mw'iyo sengero y'Umutakatifu Petero i Vaticano aho nk'uko vyama aza gushikiriza isi yose ijambo rya Papa risanzwe ryitezwe. Mu bitavye iyo misa harimwo abana batowe mu bihugu, harimwo nka za Venezuela, Irak na Uganda. Umumenyeshamakuru wa BBC i Roma, Mark Lowen, avuga ko vyerekana ko Papa afise ku mutima abakatolika baharurwa mu muliyaridi 1 n'ibice bitatu kw'isi, ashimikiye cane cane ku ngorane zihanze abimukira n'abari mu ntambara kw'isi yose. Uyo mu papa w'imyaka 83 akomoka muri Argentine yavuze ati: "Noel itwibutsa ko Imana ibandanya itwereka urukundo idufitiye, n'aho twoba turi abanyavyaha ruhebwa. Kuri jewe, ku muntu uwo ari we wese, uno munsi itubwira iti: 'Ndagukunda kandi nzokwama ndagukunda, kuko mu maso yanje uri ngirakamaro'". Imana ntigukunda kubera wiyumvira ugakora ivyiza. Igukunda ataco irabiyeko, vyonyene gusa. Urukundo rwayo ntiruva ku kungene umeze". Papa yanacishijemwo n'ibijanye n'amabi avugwa muri Ekleziya, hamwe n'isesagurwa ry'umutungo wa Ekleziya. Ati: "Nimba hari ibitagenda neza mu buzima bwacu, nimba hari ibitagenda neza muri Ekleziya, n'aho hoba ibibazo bimeze gute kw'isi, ivyo ntibizotubera inyendamuvano". Kuva mu bisagara vya Australia gushika mu mashure muri Irlande eka mbere no mu bisagara vya Amerika, Ekleziya Katolika yarahuye n'ibibazo vy'abayirongoye bagirizwa gufata ku nguvu abana kuva mu myaka mirongo iheze. Hari ibirego bikomeye n'abantu batanga ivyemezo vy'ivyo vyaha vyavuzwe cane mu matohoza abandanya akorwa. Mu biheruka, umukardinali wa Australia George Pell yarakubiswe intahe mu gahanga na sentare ko yafashe ku nguvu uduhungu tubiri two mu gisagara ca Melbourne muri Australia mu 1996. Uyo mukardinali yanahoze ajejwe ubutunzi i Vaticano - bisigura ko yaboneka nk'umutegetsi agira gatatu muri Ekleziya - niwe mutegetsi mukuru wa Ekleziya muri Australia yagirijwe ico caha. Mu ndwi iheze, Papa yarakoze impinduka zikomeye cane mu guhindura ibijanye "n'ibanga ry'ubupapa" ryatumye ivyo guhohotera abana vyakorwa n'abategetsi ba Ekleziya bisasirwa indava muri kahise. Imbere y'aho, Ekleziya yaragira ibanga ibijanye n'ugufata abana ku nguvu, mu vyafatwa ko kwari ukugerageza kugumiriza ibanga ababikorewe n'ababikoze. Ariko, ingingo nshasha yarakuyeho izo nzitizi zahora zibuza abantu kumenyesha ivyababayeko, canke ababibakoreye. Papa Francis agize iminsi atoroherezwa kuko hari benshi bamusaba gufata ingingo ruhasha kugira ngo arwanye ako kabi kiziziye Ekleziya muri ino myaka ya vuba.

column2: DR Congo: Inama nshingamateka yabogoje umukuru wayo asanzwe acuditse na Kabila
column3: Inama nshingamateka ya Repubulika y'Intwaro rusangi ya Congo yemeje ko umukuru wayo abogozwa. Ibi bibaye inyuma y'aho inama nshingamateka isohoreye urwandiko rwo kwiyamiriza uyu mukuru w'inama nshingamateka, Jeanine Mabunda, asanzwe acuditse cane na Josepf Kabila, hamwe n'abo bakorana, bakagirizwa uburongozi bubi. Iyi ni intsinzi kuri Perezida Félix Tshisekedi amaze igihe atumvikana n'uwo yasubiriye, Perezida Kabila. Mu ntango z'iyi ndwi, haradutse akaguma mu nama nshingamateka, biba ngombwa ko igipolisi kiza kubanguranya abari bashamiranye. Jeanine Mabunda, umukuru w'iyi nama nshingamateka, ni akadasohoka na Josepf Kabila, akaba yabogojwe n'amajwi 281 kuri 200. Niwe mukenyezi wa mbere yari yizigiwe ngo arongore inama nshingamateka ya Congo, ariko mu nyuma ico cizere bari bamuhaye kikaba cagiye gisubira inyuma. Abashingamateka begamiye ku ruhande rwa Perezida Tshisekedi bamwagiriza ko ahengamira ku ruhande rwa Kabila mu ngingo ziwe, arico gituma yabogojwe. Wewe arahakana ivyo yagirizwa. Aya matora yatumye abashingamateka benshi baja ku ruhande rwa Perezida Tshisekedi. Ubu rero, ni akanya keza kuri we ko gushira mu ngiro imigambi yatangaje ku wa Mungu uheze, harimwo gushinga reta nshasha avuga ko yomworohereza gukorera bikwiye abanyagihugu ba Congo. Iri bogozwa ry'umukuru w'inama nshingamateka ni uruhombo rudasanzwe kuri Perezida Kabila, yashikirije ubutegetsi mu mwaka uheze inyuma y'imyaka 18 arongoye iki gihugu. Hagti aho, n'aho yari yashikirije ubutegetsi amaze gutsindwa mu matora, yagumanye ibibanza vyinshi mu nama nshingamateka y'igihugu, co kimwe no mu nama nshingamateka z'uburere.

column2: Burundi: Abasenyeri gatolika bavuga ko utunenge mu matora bakibaza niba ivyayavuyemwo vyizigirwa
column3: Inama nkuru y'Abepiskopi b'I Burundi (CECAB) ivuga ko amatora aheruka yo ku wa 20 z'uku kwa gatanu yaranzwe n'utungenge twinshi twatumye ivyayavuyemwo bibaza niba ari ivyo kwizigira. Mw'itangazo baraye basohoye kuri uyu wa 26/5, abepiskopi 'i Burundi bamenyesha ko barungitse indorerezi 2,716 mu makomine yose, zigashobora kuja ku tuzu tw'amatora batoye. Evariste Ndayishimiye niwe yatangajwe ku vy'agateganyo n'umurwi CENI ujejwe amatora ko yatsinze ayo matora n'amajwi 68%, Agathon Rwasa akaza ubwa kabiri n'amajwi 24%. Umugambwe CNL wa Agathon Rwasa be nawe ubwiwe, ntibemera ivyayavuyemwo. Uwutemera ivyatangajwe na CENI afise umunsi ntarengwa w'uyu munsi ku wa gatatu ngo yiture sentare ijejwe kwubahiriza ibwirizwashingiro. Mw'iryo tangazo, abasenyeri bavuga ko muri rusangi amatora yabaye mw'ituze, ariko y'uko hari utunenge twinshi dushingiye kw'ihonyangwa ry'ubwigenge, ukudafata kumwe abitoza n'abatora. Utunenge abo basenyeri bashira ahabona twashoboye kubonwa n'izo ndorerezi zabo aho zashoboye gushika ni utu: "Igitsure catewe bamwe mu baserukiye abitoza ngo batere igikumu ku mpapuro z'ivyegeranyo vy'ivyavuye mu matora imbere y'uko baharura"; "Amasandugu amwe amwe yashizwemo amakarata y'amajwi arenze (bourrage des urnes)"; "Abatoreye abantu bapfuye be n'impunzi"; "Abantu wasanga bafise amakete yo gutorera abandi menshi, ivyo navyo bitemewe". "Mu tuzu tw'amatora tumwe tumwe hari abantu batoye incuro zirenga imwe". "Hari abaserukiye abitoza be n'indorerezi birukanywe mu guharura amajwi". "Hari bamwe mu batora bakorewe iterabwoba baterwa n'igitsure na bamwe mu bategetsi banabaherekeza no mu bwiherero". "Abantu batemewe n'amategeko biyadukiza bakinjira mu bibanza vyo guharuriramwo amajwi". "Gutora mw'ibanga bitubahirijwe". "Bamwe mu bahagarikizi baratswe impapuro zibaha uburenganzira bwo guhagararira amatora banakwa n'amaterefone yabo". Abo basenyeri gatorika mu Burundi babona ko utwo tunenge dutuma bibaza niba ivyari vyitezwe gutangazwa vyizigirwa. Babona kandi ko hari abariko barahohotera canke bashaka guturubika ababanyi babo inyuma y'aya matora, babahora ko badasangiye ivyiyumviro, bagasaba abategetsi guhana abo bantu. Bati: "Mu gihe amategeko yemera ko haba abahiganwa benshi, buri munyagihugu yari afise uburenganzira bwo kwerekana uwo yipfuza gushigikira". Abo basenyeri basaba ko uwumva ko yarenganijwe yokwirinda gukoresha imigumuko, agaca mu nziza y'ubutungane kugira ngo atunganirizwe. Mu matora atatu yabaye kuwa gatatu uheze, ihiganwa ryari rikomeye ryari hagati y'umugambwe CNDD-FDD uri ku butegetsi hamwe na CNL utavuga rumwe nawo. Imigambwe imwe n'abandi bitoje ku giti cabo ku mwanya w'umukuru w'igihugu baremeye ivyavuye mu matora n'ubwo banenze utunenge tumwe tumwe twibonekeje. Hagati aho, umugambwe CNL uvuga ko amatora yabayemwo ubusuma, ukavuga ko washoboye kwegeranya ivyegeranyo vy'amatora vyerekana ko ari wo wayatsinze. Domitien Ndayizeye witoza ashizwe imbere n'urunani Kira Burundi, yabwiye BBC utunenge yabonye twabaye mu matora, ariko avuga ko "igihe uwatowe azoba amaze kwemezwa na CENI ubwa nyuma nta kizomubuza gutwara Uburundi". Umugwi CENI ujejwe gutegura amatora wowo wemeza ko amatora yagenze neza. Sentare ijejwe kwubahiriza ibwirizwashingiro utegerezwa kumenyesha ibiharuro ntabanduka vyayavuyemwo ku wa 04 z'ukwa gatandatu.

column2: Yegereyegere "Kwa Siyoni": Abajejwe iryo soko ntibavuga rumwe n'abarikoreramwo
column3: Abadandariza mw'isoko rya Bujumbura City Market rizwi nko kwa Siyoni barahagaritse ibikorwa vyabo kuva kuri uyu wa kabiri biyamiriza iduzwa ry'amahera yo kuriha ibibanza bakoreramwo  gushika ku ncuro zibiri. Ariko abajejwe iryo soko, bavuga yuko ukwo kuduza ibiciro kwari gukenewe uravye ibihe tugezemwo n'uburyo bwakoreshejwe mu kuvugurura isoko. Umupfasoni umwe muri abo badandaza bavuganye na BBC atashimye kwivuga izina, avuga ko bandikiwe amakete abamenyesha ko kuva itariki 10 z'ukwezi kwa mbere 2022 amahera bahora bariha yadugijwe incuro zibiri. Agira ati: "Batumenyesheje ko kubera ibikorwa vyakozwe muri iryo soko, ko kuva mu kwezi kwa mbere amahera twahora turiha azohinduka. Akarorero abahora bariha ibihumbi 400 ku kwezi bazoriha ibihumbi 750, abahora bariha na bo 188.800 bakazoriha 312.000. Urumva ko bagwijije incuro zibiri zirenga." Ivyo bikorwa bivugwa vyakozwe ngo ni nko kwubaka ahahagarara imiduga, gusiga isima hasi hamwe n'amabombo (robine) azana amazi mu ntumbero yo kwikingira ikiza Covid-19. Abadandariza muri  iyo soko bavuga ko batanka ko ibiciro vyoduga, ariko bagasaba ko habanza kuba inama n'ingingo. BBC yashoboye kuvugana n'uburongozi bw'iryo soko, uwitwa Joseph Dukundane atubwira yuko baravye igihe cari kihaciye amahera ataduzwa kandi ibintu vyarazimvye, hamwe n'ibikorwa vyo kuvugurura isoko baranguye, ngo ukwo kuduza ibiciro kwari gukenewe: Kanda ngaha wumve ico kiganiro.

column2: Kuki Uburundi buza imbere mu bihugu  bikenye cane kw’isi?
column3: Reta y’Uburundi ikwiye kuva mu majambo ikaja mu bikorwa kugira ngo ishobore kwikura mu kabaregwa ko kwitwa igihugu gikenye kurusha ibindi kw’isi, niko Faustin Ndikumana, umukuru w’ishirahamwe PARCEM, ahanura. Ibanki y’isi yose iheruka gusohora icegeranyo c’umwaka wa 2021 ku butunzi n’imibereho y’abanyagihugu gishira Uburundi mu kibanza c’inyuma, ivyatumye benshi bongera kwihweza kw’iterambere ry’Uburundi. Mu kiganiro na BBC, Ndikumana avuga ko imwe mu ngorane nyamukuru Uburundi bufise ari igiturire, akavuga ko mbere ‘ivyo kukirwanya biriko birasubira inyuma ugereranije n’uko vyari bimeze kera’. Mu gihe umukuru w’igihugu Evariste Ndayishimiye yiyemeje kurwanya igiturire, Ndikumana abona ko ubutungane kuri we ari inzitizi ikomeye. Ati: “Agerageza gute kukirwanya mu gihe ubutungane butariko burakora. Ugushaka ndavyumva, mugabo ubutungane butariko burakora, ntashobora kuvuga ngo uriko urarwanya igiturire”. Umukuru w’iri shirahamwe ryishinze gukangurira Abarundi guhindura ingendo abona ko Uburundi budashobora guterimbere mu gihe hakiri ibihushane iyo hageze gushira mu ngiro imigambi y’iterambere. Iki cegeranyo c’ibanki y’isi yose ku mwimbu rusangi mu gihugu (Produit National Brut, PIB) ku muntu mu 2021, cerekana ko Uburundi buza mu kibanza ca 195 kuri 196 aho Umurundi umwe aronka USD 240 gusa ku mwaka wose. Ndikumana avuga ko bapima ibi bisunze “umwimbu wimburwa mu gihugu kanaka kuko niwo uba werekana ubutunzi igihugu kiba gifise, hanyuma bagaca baraba abanyagihugu ingene bangana, umwimbu cimbura mu bisata bitandukanye ugaca ugabanganywa ku banyagihugu bakibamwo, baca baraba rero ico umunyegihugu umwe umwe wese yoba aronka”. “Ni nk’uko wofata urugo kanaka rurimwo umugore n’umugabo n’abana icenda nk’akarorero, ugaharura ivyo bimbura ku kwezi, amahera baronka ku kwezi, ugaca uyagabura rero na cumi na rimwe, ari ho rero uca ubona amahera umuntu umwe umwe muri urwo rugo ashobora kuronka ku kwezi”. “Urumva n’ingo zirasumbana, hariho ingo zimbura vyinshi. Amahera yinjira ari menshi. Uko muza kuyagabura muri bake, niko ukubaho neza guca kwiyongera. Iyo muyagabura muri benshi nayo ari make, ubukene buca bwiyongera”. Ku ruhande rw’Uburundi, Faustin Ndikumana abona ko Uburundi bwimbura bike ariko bugategerezwa kugaburira abantu benshi, bigatuma bwama buboneka ko bukenye. Uburundi ni igihugu kibeshejweho ahanini n’uburimyi, ibiharuro bikerekana ko 90% ari bo babeshejweho n’isuka. Icegeranyo c’ikigo ISTEEBU kijejwe kwegeranya ibiharuro giherutse gusohora icegeranyo co mu mwaka wa 2019-2020 cerekana ko abarundi 40% bashobora kumara umusi wose badafunguye. Ibi biri uku mu gihe abarongoye igihugu bavuga ko umwimbu ari wose. Mu gihe yariko ashikiriza abashingamateka n’abakenguzamateka ivyaranguwe n’ubushikiranganji butandukanye mu gice ca kabiri c’umwaka uheze hari mu kw’icumi kw’umwaka uheze nyene ari nawo iki cegeranyo cerekeye,  umushikiranganji wa mbere Alain-Guillaume Bunyoni  yavuze ko muri ico gihe honyene igihugu cari gifise amatoni menshi y’umusesekara ku mwibu w’ibigori. Ndikumana abona ko reta n’abakora ivyegeranyo nk’ibi badahuza kubera reta yoyo ikunda gukoresha imvugo ya poritike. Ati: “Wewe uri mu mabanga, bavuze uko ibintu bimeze birashobora kutakunezera kuko bica vyerekana ko umengo utariko uratunganya ibintu neza. “Imvugo ya poritike sico kimwe n’iy’abahinga, ni naco gituma turiko turasubirira n’inyuma, umunyeporitike wewe yivugira poritike aho kuraba ivyo abahinga bavuga”. Mu gusigura ingorane Uburundi bufise zituma bwama buri inyuma mu butunzi, Faustin Ndikumana afatira ku gitabo ishirahamwe ryiwe riherutse gusohora, aho ryihweza imyaka 60 Uburundi bumaze bwikukiye, n’imyaka ibiri y’ubutegetsi bwa Evariste Ndayishimiye. Muri iki gitabo, yerekana ko imigambi itegurwa ariko ko, iyo hageze kuyishira mu ngiro, “umengo hariko hakorwa ibihushane n’ivyategerezwa kuba biriko birakorwa kugira dushikire intumbero y’iterambere”. Asigura bimwe muri ibi bihushane biri muri iki gitabo, ica mbere ciyongera ku giturire avuga ko “tugomba guterimbere mu gihe tuvuga ko Uburundi bwikwiye kandi ivyegeranyo vyerekana ko ari ubwanyuma k’isi mu bihugu bitunze”. Ati: “Uwuja gukira indwara arayirata, none wewe nimba urwaye indwara, ntiwemere ko uyirwaye, wumva uzoyikira gute? Banza wemere ko ukenye”. Imvo ya kabiri ashikiriza abona ko igihugu kigomba  gutera imbere mu gihe atanzira irashe yo kugiteza imbere ihari ifatiye ku citegererezo c'uko ahandi bigenda. Ati: “Turagenda tukandika ibitabo, ngo plan national de developpement, tukandika, tugakora amanama, ngo dushaka gufata intumbero mugabo izo recommendations tugaca tubika. “Gushika ubu nta kintu na kimwe ca programme-vision usanga reta iriko irakorerako”. Ariko rero, hano ntabona ibintu kumwe na reta ufatiye ku vyo umushikiranganji wa mbere Bunyoni yabwiye abashingamateka n’abakenguzamateka mu kw’icumi kw’umwaka uheze, ari nawo urabwa n’uru rutonde rw’Ibanki y’isi yose, aho yemeza ko integuro ya reta y’igice ca kabiri yakozwe neza mbere hisunzwe uburyo buvuye hagati mu gihugu, akavuga ko ari na ko vyagenze mu gice ca mbere. Yavuze kandi ko n’ibikorwa bishika 290 vyaranguwe neza hisunzwe integuro ya reta kandi ku rugero rwa 79% ku bushikiranganji bwayiranguye ku rugero ruto, be no kuri 97% ku bushikiranganji bwavyitwayemwo neza gusumba ubundi.  Yemeza ko muri rusangi imigambi reta yari ifise yashizwe mu ngiro ku rugero rwa 88%, mu gihe mu gice ca mbere yaranguwe ku rugero rwa 81%. Hagati aho, umushikiranganji wa mbere Bunyoni yaremeje ko ubutunzi bw’igihugu muri ico gice bwagabanutse kubera ikiza karanda ca Covid-19, mbere ko hari n’ibindi bikorwa vyari bitegekanijwe bitashoboye kuranguka. Imvo ya gatatu atanga, avuga ko Uburundi budashobora gutera imbere mu gihe gutanga akazi hatisungwa ubushobozi n’ubumenyi. Ati: “Wewe uvuga ko ushaka gutera imbere gute udashira imbere incabwenge, abashoboye akazi, ubushakashatsi ngo ubushire imbere, mu nzego nyinshi ugasanga abantu bariko bahabwa amabanga badakurikiza ubushobozi, mu gihe ubu ata n’ibigo vy’ubushakashatsi bihari...none wotera imbere gute”? Ikindi gihushane yerekana, ni uko igihugu kigomba gutera imbere “mu gihe ata buryo buhari bwo kuzana amafaranga mvamakungu mu gihugu kugira afashe mukuzibira ikinogo c’amafaranga Uburundi budafise kandi yongere afashe mw’iboneka ry’amafaranga y’agaciro”. Ati: “Mbega iryo terambere uzorironka gute? Uzokoresha amarundi? N’aho worara urayafyatura, ukayarwiza muri BRB ntaco azokumarira”. PARCEM ibona ko amasoko yashobora gutuma igihugu kironka aya mafaranga asa n’ayadakora neza. Ati: “... raba n’ikawa yasubiye inyuma, icayi casubiye inyuma, igisata c’ubukerarungendo ntitugiteza imbere kugira ngo bazane amadevises, raba n’amafaranga y’agaciro yovuye mu nzahabu n’ubutare urabona ko vyanse ...none ushaka gutera imbere gute?” “Nta barwizatunga bazana imitahe mu gihugu; kwaka ingurane ntibikunda kuko usanga badashobora kwizera inzego, badashobora kuzizera ku buryo boziha ingurane y’amafaranga aboneka”. Ikindi gihushane PARCEM ibona gihagaze kw’ikoreshwa ry’amafaranga ya reta ibona ko harimwo igipfungu. Ati: “Wewe woza gutera imbere gute mu gihe n’ingene reta ikoresha amafaranga ata muco urimwo, umengo amafaranga akoreshwa mu kanywababo, amafaranga adakurikiza imigambi y’iterambere izwi, amafaranga atwarirwa mu gifuri, za cour des comptes zitayakontorora?”. Mu mwaka uheze wa 2021, Prezida Ndayishimiye yumvikanye anegura bikomeye abo mu nzego zitandukanye n'abamufasha imirimo y'igihugu abagiriza  kuba aribo batuma ibintu bitagenda neza mu gihugu. Ni mu gihe yaheruka “kuririra imbere” y’abacamanza kw'izina ry'abenegihugu, aho yavuga ko batakironka ubutungane bubereye kubera abo bacamanza bamunzwe n'ibiturire. Umukuru w’iri shirahamwe rihamagarira abantu guhindura ingendo abona ko umukuru w'igihugu afise utwigoro kandi ko n’amajambo ashikiriza atanga icizere, ariko ko abari musi yiwe batamufasha.

column2: Ayavugwa mu mupira w'amaguru : Shawcross, Gibbs, Martinez, Solskjaer, Klopp, Hodgson
column3: Inter Miami, umurwi wo mw'ihiganwa ryo muri Amerika Major League Soccer washinzwe na David Beckham hamwe na Phil Neville, wipfuza kugura abahoze ari abakinyi mpuzamakungu b'Ubwongereza-  Ryan Shawcross w'imyaka 33 akina hagati muri Stoke City hamwe na Kieran Gibbs w'imyaka 31 akina inyuma muri West Brom. (Sun) Manchester City igiye kuva inyuma mu ruhigi rwo kurondera kugura umusatorizi wa Inter Milan Lautaro Martinez akomoka muri Argentine mu gihe uyu musatirizi w'imyaka 23 yiteze gutera igikumu ku masezerano mashasha n'uyu murwi wo mw'ihiganwa ry'Ubutaliyano Serie A. (Eurosport) Jurgen Klopp ntiyishimiye poritike ya Liverpool ijanye no kugura abakinyi inyuma y'aho mu kwa mbere guheze uyu murwi unaniriwe no kugura umukinyi w'inyuma w'umunya Senegal Kalidou Koulibaly w'imyaka 29 asanzwe akina muri Napoli. (Sun) Ander Herrera kina hagati muri Paris St-Germain avuga ko amategeko ajanye no kutarenza urugero mw'ikoreshwa ry'amafaranga (Financial Fair Play) azobuza uyu murwi kugura umusatirizi wa Barcelona Lionel Messi ubu afise imyaka 33. (El Larguero via AS) Umukuru wa Bayern Munich Karl-Heinz Rummenigge avuga ko ryoba ari "iteka" ari nka hamwe boshobora kugura umukinyi Mohamed Salah wa Liverpool ariko agashimangira ko uyu murwi ata mugambi ufise wo kurondera uyo musatirizi w'imyaka 28 akomoka mu Misiri.  (ON Time Sports via Mirror) Kizigenza wa Real Madrid Sergio Ramos yanse ayandi masezerano y'imyaka ibiri akaba afise integuro yo kuja gukinira uwundi murwi wo ku mugabane wa Buraya mu gihe amasezerano n'uyu murwi wiwe azoba arangiye mu mpera z'ihiganwa ry'uyu mwaka. (Cope - in Spanish) Manchester United bizoyibera ngombwa ko irindira ihiganwa rirangire kugira ngo ishobore gutangura ibiganiro n'umumenyereza wayo, umunya Norgeve Ole Gunnar Solskjaer, amasezerani akaba azorangira mu mpera z'umwaka w'inkino wa 2021-22. (Sun) Real Madrid niyo ifise amahirwe yo gutahukana umukinyi wo kuruhande rw'i buryo inyuma wa Bayern Munich, umunya Autriche David Alaba w'imyaka 28, mu gihe Chelsea idashaka gushitsa umusharaha asaba ungana na 400.000 y'ama pawundi ku ndwi. column2: Uyu muringa ukingira abagore umugera wa SIDA?
column3: Hari akaringa gashasha gaherutse kwemerwa n'ishami rya ONU rijejwe amagara y'abantu kw'isi, OMS/WHO, ko kokoreshwa mu gukingira abagore umugera wa SIDA. Ni akaringa gakozwe muri silicone  kinjizwa mu gitsina c'umugore maze kakarekura umuti witwa dapivirine urwanya umugera. N'aho hari intambwe zimaze gushikwako mu kuvura no gukinga, umugera wa SIDA uracasasika inganda mu bihugu bitari bike cane cane ku mugabane wa Afrika. Ibice bibiri vya bitatu vy'abantu bose banduye umugera wa SIDA kw'isi bari ku mugabane wa Afrika, bafise imyaka hagati ya 15 na 24, nk'uko bivugwa n'ishirahamwe ONU. Mu buseruko n'ubumanuko bwa Afrika, abantu barenga imiriyoni 20 bagendana uwu mugera. Abagore bakiri bato nibo ahanini babangamirwa: ku ncuro zibiri ugereranije n'abagabo, abagore nibo bafise igihamana kibi co kwandura umugera wa SIDA. OMS iherutse gutanga uburenganzira bwo gukoresha uwu muringa kugira ngo abagore bashobore kwikingira mu gihe bakora imibonano mpuzabitsina. Mu kiganiro Africa Daily ca BBC, Doreen Morah Moracha w'imyaka 28 aba i Nairobi muri Kenya, asanzwe agendana umugera wa SIDA avuga ko kwikingira ari co kintu ca mbere kiza imbere mu kurwanya uwu mugera. Moracha amaze imyaka 16 yose afata imiti yo gupfupfahaza. Kubw'iwe, gufata iyi miti ubuzima bwose si ikintu coroshe. Ati: "Nipfuza ko abandi bose bokwikingira uwu mugera wa SIDA, kubera burya hari abibaza ko ari ibintu vyoroshe, ariko gufata imiti ubuzima bwawe bwose si ikintu coroshe na gato". Bumwe mu buryo bukoreshwa cane mu kwikingira umugera wa SIDA, harimwo udukingirizo, harimwo mbere n'agakingirizo k'abagore. Umupfasoni Moracha avuga ko abagore batoroherwa kugakoresha kubera akenshi usanga atari bo bifatira ingingo. Avuga ko abagabo bobo boroherwa gukoresha agakingirizo kabo kubera akenshi umugabo ari we afata ingingo. Ati: "Iyo umugore asavye ko bokwikingira, umugabo atabishatse aca akamomora akagata, rero muri ico gihe umugore nta bubasha aba afise bwo gufata ingingo". Hari kandi ibinini bifatwa imbere canke inyuma y'imibonano mpuzabitsina (PREP) ku muntu atarandura uwu mugera, ariko ibi navyo ntivyoroshe kuronka. Uwo muringa uje kuba nk'inyishu kuri izo ngorane. Ni umuringa wambarwa mu kiringo c'imisi 28, hanyuma muri ico kiringo cose ugasohora umuti uzwi nka dapivirine utuma umuntu atandura umugera wa SIDA. Anna Kukundakwe ajejwe imigambi mu kigo kijejwe amagara y'abantu, uburenganzira bwa muntu n'iterambere muri Uganda avuga ko ikintu nyamukuru ari uko umugore we nyene ubwiwe ashobora kwishirira uru muringa mu gitsina, atarinze gufashwa n'umuganga. Ati: "Kenshi iyo umugore yipfuza gukora imibonano mpuzabitsinda yikingiye, ntibimworohera gusaba ko uwo bashaka kuyikorana yambara agakingirizo. Ariko uwu muringa uramuha ububasha bwo kwikingira igihe abishatse mw'ibanga, kandi ntategerezwa kubwira umugabo ko awambaye". Mu bikorwa vyo kugerageza uwu muringa, vyabonetse ko igihamana kibi co kwandura uwu mugera cagabanutse gushika ku bice vyababa 30% gusa, ariko Rachel Bagley arongoye igisata co gupima imiti mw'ishirahamwe rijejwe amagara y'abantu kw'isi, OMS, avuga ko bishobora kuja hasi gusumba. Uwu muringa wambarwa n'uyo mugore yiyizi ko atarandura umugera kandi yiyizi ko akunze gukora imibonano mpuzabitsina, umupfasoni Anna akavuga ko abadakunze gukora iyo mibonano batokwirukira uwo muringa. Ati: "Rero abagore boronswa inyigisho zikwiye mu buryo bwose bushoboka kugira ngo bashobore kwihitiramwo bo nyene uburyo bokoresha, nimba bipfuza gukoresha agakingirizo, ibinini canke uwu muringa". Igiciro c'uwo muringa ntikiramenyekana neza, ariko umupfasoni Bagley avuga ko utegerezwa kuzoba utazimvye, uri ku giciro kimwe n'ubundi bukingirizo. Yipfuza ko uwu muringa woba ku giciro giciriritse cane cane mu bihugu bikenye birangwamwo umugera ku rugero runini, mbere ugatangwa ku buntu.

column2: Ubutunzi bwa Ethiopia burabangamiwe n'intambara ya Tigray
column3: Intambara y'imbere muri Ethiopia imaze amezi 10, imaze guhitana abantu ibihumbi n'ibihumbi, abaharurwa muri za miriyoni barata izabo abandi na bo bari mu kaga  aho bakeneye imfashanyo. Ariko ivyo si vyo vyonyene imaze kwonona ku gihugu kiza ubugira kabiri mu kubamwo abantu benshi muri Afrika - intambara imaze kwonona vyinshi no mu butunzi, bishobora gufata imyaka n'iyindi kugira bisanurwe. Ku mugwa mukuru Addis - Ababa, Tigist w'imyaka 26, atashimye ko amazina yiwe yose akoreshwa, avuga ko amafaranga akoresha ku kwezi ku kwezi ubu yigwije na kabiri kubera imvo zibiri: intambara yadutse muri Tigray mu kwezi kwa cumi  na rimwe hamwe n'ikiza ca coronavirus. Avuga ati: "Imbere y'intambara na Covid, nakoresha birr 1.000 (nk'ama dorari 22) buri kwezi mu gusuma ivyo guteka. Ubu nkoresha birr 2.000". "Ubu ibintu birazimvye gusumba, terefone, impuzu, ivyo kurya." Ibiharuro vyo kugereranya bitangwa n'inzego za reta vyerekana ko ibiciro vy'ivyankenerwa koko vyaduze  muri Ethiopia - muri rusangi mu kwezi kw'indwi vyari  ica kane hejuru y'uko vyari bimeze nk'ico gihe nyene mu mwaka uheze. Tigist akora mw'isoko-duka (supermarket) kugira ashobore gufasha umuryango. Wewe ajejwe gusuma ivyo kurya, musazawe nawe akariha inzu. Avuga kandi ko ''kuvunja idorari na vyo bitameze neza. Mu mwaka uheze, kw'idorari rimwe ($1)  waronka birr 35, ubu uronka 45." Faisal Roble, umuhinga  ari muri Amerika yihweza ibintu n'ibindi na cane cane ivyo mu karere k'ihembe rya Afrika, avuga ko gukoresha amafaranga mu bikorwa vy'intambara bigira "ingaruka mbi ku bushobozi bwa Ethiopia bwo gushikira ama dorari ''  bigatuma kandi urugero rwo kuvunja rutituka. Ntibizwi amafaranga yose intambara imaze gutwara uko angana ariko ikigo citwa Trading Economics kigereranya ko amafaranga aja mu vya gisirikare azoshika kuri miriyoni 502 z'ama dorari gushika mu mpera z'uyu mwaka, mu gihe zari miriyoni  460 mu mwaka uheze. Mu   ndwi iheze umunyamabanga mukuru wa ONU Antonio Guterres yavuze ko iyo ntanbara imaze gutwara igihugu umuriyaridi w'ama dorari. Imbere y'intambara n'ikiza ca coronavirus, ubutunzi bwa Ethiopia bwari mu bunyaruka kwiyongera cane mu karere, bwaduga muri rusangi ku rugero rwa 10% ku mwaka mu myaka 10 yo gushika mu 2019, nk'uko bigereranywa na banki y'isi (Banque Mondiale). Mu gihe Tigist avuga urugero rwo kuvunja muri banki, Roble avuga ko birr (ifaranga rya Ethiopia) kw'isoko isanzwe ho ryakorotse gusumba, ubu idorari rimwe rikaba rivunjwa birr  67. Avuga ko abagwizatunga muri ico gihugu ubu imitsi yama yaranze kubera ikibazo c'umutekano mu gihe intambara ubu yarenze imbibe za Tigray ikaba igeze mu ntara bihana imbibe za Afar na Amhara. Intambara yatanguye igihe umugambwe wahora utwara intara ya Tigray, Tigray  People's Liberation Front (TPLF) watera amakambi ya gisirikare mu kwezi kwa 11, biturutse ku kutumvikana ku bibazo vya poritike n'umushikiranganji wa mbere, Abiy Ahmed. Kuva ico gihe, ingabo za Ethiopia - hamwe n'ingabo za Eritrea zibashigikiye, bafatanije n'igipolisi n'utundi tugwi tugendana ibigwanisho, baciye batangura intambara imaze gusesa amaraso menshi, yo kugwanya TPLF. Impande zompi zimaze kwagirizwa gukora amahano, harimwo gusambanya ku nguvu no kwica  ikivunga abanyagihugu basanzwe. Intara ya Tigray nta vyankenerwa ikironka, harimwo uburyo bwo gutumatumanako hamwe na banki, kuva reta ya Ethiopia ifashe ingingo yo kwugarana iyo ntara mu kwezi kwa gatandatu, inyuma y'aho abagwanyi ba Tigray bigaruriye umugwa mukuru Mekelle. Abantu 400.000 muri Tigray ubu babayeho nk'abugarijwe n'inzara mu gihe  kubashikiriza imfashanyo bigorana cane, umuyagankuba n'ibitoro na vyo bikaba biboneka nabi nabi bigatuma ibiciro biduga. Filmon Berhane aba muri Mekelle yabwiye BBC mu rurimi rw'igi-Tigrinya ko ibiciro vy'ivyo kurya n'amazu muri iyi minsi vyaduze cane. Yavuze ati: "Nta mafaranga ahari  kuko amabanki yose arugaye, muri reta na ho ntibagitanga imishashara". Mu makungu, iyo ntambara yagize ingaruka kw'izina rya Ethiopia nk'igihugu co kujanamwo imitahe nk'uko bivugwa na Irgard Erasamus wo mu kigo ca NKC African Economics. Madame  Erasmus afatira akarorero nko ku gisata c'amaterefone co muri Ethiopia caheruka gushirwa kw'isoko y'abikorera ku giti cabo, aho cari cakweze abanyamitahe benshi barimwo abo muri Afrika y'Epfo nk'igihangange MTN. Ariko amaherezo kompanyi imwe gusa ni yo yahavuye ihiganirwa rumwe mu mpusha zibiri zari zashizwe kw'isoko, n'urufatanye rw'amakompanyi rurongowe na Safaricom yo muri Kenya ku mafaranga angana na miriyoni 850 y'amadorari. Abahinga bavuga ko intambara ya Tigray yatumye abanyamitahe bacika intege. Ukwiyongera kw'ubutunzi bwa Ethiopia muri rusangi uyu mwaka kugereranywa ko kuzogabanuka cane kuva kuri 6% mu 2020 gushika ku 2% mu 2021 - urugero rwa mbere rwo hasi mu myaka hafi 20, ku bw'ikigega mpuzamakungu FMI. Igihugu kigurira hanze ibintu biciye miriyaridi 14 z'amadorari ku mwaka, mu gihe kigurisha ibiciye  imiriyaridi 3,4 z'ama dorari. Hari n'amakenga ku kwiyongera kw'ideni rya reta ya Ethiopia mu gihugu hagati, aho hari abagereranya ko rizoshika ku miriyaridi 60 z'ama dorari uyu mwaka, hafi y'ibice 70% y'umwimbu rusangi wo muri ico gihugu. Mu gihe Amerika yafatiye ingingo zimwe zimwe zerekeye impusha zo kuja muri ico gihugu abanye Ethiopia bafise uruhara muri iyo ntambara, kandi ikanahagarika zimwe zimwe mu mfashanyo yaha Ethiopia, gushika ubu amakungu yirinze kuremera cane reta ku bijanye n'ubutunzi, canke ngo ahagarike imigambi y'imfashanyo y'ubutunzi,  hafi ica kane c'abanyagihugu babayeho musi y'urugero rw'ubukene, na yo muri rusangi umwimbu w'umunyagihugu ungana n'amadorari 850 ku mwaka.

column2: Abo umurongo ukaze mu bibanza bikomeye muri reta y'aba Taliban
column3: Aba Taliban batangaje abagize reta mfatakibanza muri Afghanistan, baca banamenyesha ko ico gihugu kigiye kugengwa n'amategeko ya Islam. Iyo reta, igizwe n'abagabo gusa, irimwo abakuru bakuru mu ndongozi z'aba-Taliban bamwe bazwi cane mu bitero ku ngabo z'abanyamerika mu myaka 20 iheze. Reta izoba irongowe na Mullah Mohammad Hassan Akhund, umwe mu bashinze uwo muhari, nawe asanzwe ari ku rutonde rw'abatemerwa n'ishirahamwe mpuzamakungu ONU. Umushikiranganji w'intwaro yo hagati mu gihugu azoba umugabo atinyitse cane aronderwa na FBI arongoye umugwi w'abagwanyi ba Haqqani. Aba Taliban bigaruriye igihugu nka cose mu ndwi zitatu ziheze, birukanye abari batowe n'abanyagihugu. Itangazwa ry'abagize reta n'intambwe ikomeye igana ku butegetsi bw'aba Taliban.  Ubwo butegetsi buzohangana n'ibibazo bikomeye , hadasigaye inyuma ico gukomeza no guha amaragamo ubutunzi bw'ico gihugu hamwe no kwemerwa mu makungu. Kare aba-Taliban bari bavuze ko bashaka gushinga reta irimwo impande zose . Ariko abashikiranganji bose batangajwe ku wa kabiri basanzwe ari indongozi zizwi z'aba-Taliban , kandi nta mugore n'umwe arimwo. Reta Zunze ubumwe za Amerika zivuga ko ''zifise  impungenge" inyuma y'aho aba Taliban bashiriye ahabona abagize reta yabo y'abashikiranganji b'abagabo gusa kandi irimwo abantu bafitaniye isano n'ibitero ku ngabo z'Abanyamerika. Ubushikirangani bw'imigenderanire bwa Amerika buvga ko buriko burihweza iryo tangazo ryo ku wa kabiri. Umukenguzamateka wa Amerika Lindsey Graham yavuze ko iyo reta mfatakibanza ari umurongo "w'abamenanzugi hamwe  n'abanyamacuniro". N'umwe  mu bakuru b'aba Republicans yiyamirije ingingo bavuga ko "itiyumviriwe neza"  yo kuva muri Afghanistan yafashwe na prezida w'umu Democrat Joe Biden. Mw'itangazo ku wa kabiri, ubushikiranganji bw'imigenderanire (State Department) bwavuze buti: "Twabonye ko urutonde rw'amazina yatangajwe rugizwe gusa n'abasanzwe ari abanywanyi b'aba Taliban canke abo bakorana kandi ata mugore arimwo. "Turatewe impungenge kandi na  kahise ka bamwe bamwe muri bo." Ribandanya rivuga ko ''Amerika izofatira aba-Taliban ku vyo bakora, atari ku majambo." Itangazo rivuga ko Amerika "Izofatira aba-Taliban  ku vyo biyemeje" vyo gutanga inzira itekanye ku banyamahanga n'abanya-Afghanistan bafise ivyangombwa vyo kugira ingendo, harimwo no ''kwemerera indege ubu ziteguriye kuva muri Afghanistan". Ribandanya rivuga riti: ''Twibukije kandi ko twiteze ko aba-Taliban bazokora ibishoboka kugira ubutaka bwa Afghanistan ntibukoreshwe mu kubangamira ibindi bihugu". ''Isi iriko ibirabira hafi."  Itangazo ryitirirwa indongozi kizigenza y'aba-Taliban Mawlawi Hibatullah Akhundzada ryabwiye reta gushira mu ngiro itegeko rya Sharia. Iryo tangazo ryasohotse mu rurimi rw'icongereza rivuga  ko aba-Taliban "bashaka imigenderanire ikomeye kandi imeze neza n'ababanyi n'ibindi bihugu ishingiye ku kwubahana no kuvugana" - ariko harimwo kugabisha ko bazokwubahiriza amategeko n'amasezerano  mpuzamakungu "adateye kubiri n'itegeko rya Islam n'ayandi mateka y'igihugu". Hibatullah Akhundzada ntarigera aboneka ahagaragara. Ubu nibwo butumwa bwa mbere buvuye kuri we bugiye ahabona kuva aba-Taliban bigaruriye ubutegetsi mu kwezi guheze. Hassan Akhund, umushikiranganji wa mbere mushasha w'imfatakibanza , yarabaye umushikiranganji w'imigenderanire kuva mu 1996 gushika mu 2001, igihe uwo mugwi wari ku butegetsi. Azwi cane cane mu burongozi bw'idini muri uwo mugwi kurusha mu ruhande rwa gisirikare. Igenwa ryiwe ribonwa nko guheberanira, inyuma y'ivyavuzwe ko hoba harabaye gusubiranamwo hagati y'indongozi z'aba-Taliban z'umurongo woroshe na bagenzi babo b'umurongo ukaze. Umuvugizi w'aba Taliban, Zabihullah Mujahid, yagize ati:"Turazi ko abanyagihugu bari barindiranye igishika reta nshasha. Turishuye ku cipfuzo c'abo." Sarajuddin Haqqani, umushikiranganji mushasha w'intwaro yo hagati mu gihugu, ni we arongoye umugwi w'abagwanyi uzwi kw'izina rya Haqqani ufitaniye ubucuti n'aba Taliban, ukaba ari na wo uri inyuma y'ibitero vyahitanye abantu benshi muri ico gihugu cari kimaze imyaka 20 mu ntambara. Bitandukanye n'aba Taliban, umuhari wa Haqqani wose wiswe umuhari w'iterabwoba ukorera mu mahanga na Reta zunze Ubumwe za Amerika. Abandi bagenywe harimwo Mullah Yaqoob nk'umushikiranganji wo kwivuna abansi, Amir Khan Muttaqi, uwo imigenderanire n'amakungu hamwe n'abari mu bashinzwe umuhari w'aba Taliban Mullah Abdul Ghani Baradar na Mullah Abdul Salam Hanafi nk'ivyegera. Yaqoob n'umuhungu w'uwashinze uwo muhari akaba yaranabaye umuyobozi wawo wo mu rwego rwo hejuru Mullah Omar. Baradar yigeze gutwara ibiro vy'uwo muhari bijejwe politike, anahagararira ishirwa ry'umukono ku masezerano yo kuva muri ico gihugu na Amerika. Abajijwe impamvu ata mupfasoni n'umwe arimwo, Ahmadullah Wasiq, wo mu mugwi ujejwe imico mu ba Taliban, yabwiye umumenyeshamakuru wa BBC Secunder Kemani ko abagize reta bose bataragenwa.

column2: Umugambi wa UK wo kurungika abimukira mu Rwanda uteye kubiri 'na kamere y'Imana' - Welby
column3: Umukuru w'ishengero ry'Ubwongereza (Church of England), Justin Welby, kuri uyu wa Mungu yaneguye umugambi wa Reta y'Ubwongereza wo kurungika mu Rwanda abarondera ubuhungiro. Uyu Musenyeri mukuru wa Canterbury avuga ko uwu mugambi "uteye kubiri na kamere y'Imana". Mu nyigisho yiwe ya Pasika, Justin Welby yavuze ko igihe c'izuka rya Yesu Kristu/Yesu Kristo atari ico "kuremeka inshingano zacu abandi". Reta ivuga ko ari ngombwa ko haba impinduka kugira bakingire ubuzima bw'abantu ntibagurishwe.l Muri uwu mugambi w'imiriyoni 120 z'amapadundi (hafi imiriyoni 157 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika)  - watangajwe muri ino ndwi - abantu bafatwa ko binjiye mu Bwongereza bidaciye mu mategeko bazotwarwa muri iki gihugu c'Urwanda, ari ho bazokwemererwa gusabira uburenganzira bwo kuja kuba muri ico gihugu. Iyi ngingo iriyamirizwa bikomeye, aho amashirahamwe atabara abatishoboye arenga 160 ariko asaba abashikiranganji guhagarika ico bita poritike "y'ubugome". Eka n'imigambwe itavuga rumwe n'uwuri ku butegetsi mu Bwongereza na bamwe mu bagendera ku vyiyumviro vya kera (Conservatives) baranegura iyi ngingo. Mw'ijambo yashikirije ku Rusengero rukuru rwa Canterbury kuri uno musi wa Mungu wa Pasika, Musenyeri Welby yavuze ko  hari "ibibazo bikomeye bitewe n'irungikwa ry'abasaba ubuhungiro mu mahanga". Yongerako ati: "Ibisigaye ni ivya poritike n'abanyaporitike. Ica ngenderwako n'uko vyoba ari vyiza mu maso y'Imana. Ariko siko bimeze. " ...kandi ntibihuye n'inshingano zacu nk'igihugu kigendera ku ndangagaciro k'aba-Kristu: kuko kuremeka abandi inshingano zacu, naho hoba ari ku gihugu kirondera ineza nk'Urwanda, ni igihushane ca kamere k'Imana, kuko yo nyene ubwayo yaremeye kwiremeka ibitunanira". Ubushikiranganji w'intwaro yo hagati yashigikiye uwu mugambi bufatiye ku majambo yo kunegura yavuzwe n'uyu musenyeri, bukavuga ko Ubwongereza "bwishimira kahise kabwo" ko gufasha abo bose babikeneye, kandi ko n'imigambi yo guha ubuhungiro ababukeneye wafashije ibihumbi amajana n'amajana kuronka "inzira nziza kandi zemewe n'amategeko zo kwubaka kazoza kabo". Umuvugizi w'ubwo bushikiranganji avuga ati: "Hagati aho, isi irahanzwe n'ikibazo c'abimukira ku rugero rutari bwigere rubaho rero hakenewe impinduka kugira ngo abantu babi bashora abantu bareke gushira ubuzima bw'abantu mu kaga hanyuma n'ikibazo c'abarondera ubuhungiro kw'isi cananiraye gitorerwe umuti". Ubushikiranganji bw'intwaro yo hagati buvuga ko Urwanda "rutekanye" kandi ko ruzokwiga abasaba ubuhungiro hisunzwe amategeko mpuzamakungu akingira uburenganzira bwa kiremwamuntu. Amasendika y'abakozi ba reta avuga ko iyi ngingo ari "iy'ubunyamaswa" ariko ko abategetsi bazotegerezwa kuyishira mu ngiro canke naho bakagenda. Ku wa kane, Ubwongereza n'Urwanda vyashize ahabona amasezerano mashasha azotuma bamwe mu barondera ubuhungiro bazoronswa gusa itike y'indege yo kugenda bakaja muri ico gihugu.
