column2: Coronavirus: WHO isaba ibihugu vya Afrika kutajugunya incanco zataye igihe
column3: Ishami rya ONU rijejwe amagara y'abantu kw'isi, OMS/WHO, risaba ibihugu vya Afrika kudaturira incanco za Covid-19 zishobora kuba zarataye igihe. Ibi bihugu vyasabwe kubangira bikarindira iyindi nzira nyayo. Aka kamo ka OMS kaje inyuma y'aho ibihugu vya Malawi na Sudani y'Epfo bitangarije ko bitegura guturira doze hafi 70.000 z'urucanco rwa Oxford-AstraZeneca kubera zataye igihe hagati muri uku kwa kane. Ariko ikigo ca Afrika kijejwe kurwanya indwara (Africa CDC) kivuga ko cari cijejwe ko izi ncanco ata ngorane zifise, zishobora gukoreshwa. Incanco nyinshi zirashobora gukoreshwa gushika ku mezi 36 (umwaka n'igice) kuva zihinguwe, ariko kubera ko izi za Covid-19 ari nshasha, nta vyemezo bikwiye bihari vyerekana ko zishobora kumara igihe kirekire zigifise inguvu. Ingingo ya nyuma izofatwa n'ibisata vy'ibihugu bijejwe kugenzura imiti. Igikorwa co gucandaga abantu mu kubakingira coronavirus muri Afrika kigenda bukebuke, ahanini kubera atazihari zikwiye hamwe n'abantu benshi bazifiseko amakenga. Mu kiganiro n'abanyamakuru ejo ku wa kane, John Nkengasong,  arongoye ikigo Africa CDC yavuze ati:  "Akamo ntera ibihugu vya Afrika ni aka: nimba uruhara rwacu ari ukurondera izi ncanco, namwe uruhara rwanyu ni uko mukoresha izi ncanco". Malawi ivuga ko itegura guturira doze zirenga 16.000 z'urucanco rwa AstraZeneca rwahinguwe na kompanyi y'Ubuhindi, Serum Institute of India (SII), kubera igihe cazo ntarengwa cari gushika ku wa 13 z'uku kwa kane. Ku ruhande rwayo, Sudani y'Epfo itegura guturira doze hafi 59.000 kuri iyo mvo nyene. Izi ncanco zari zahawe ibihugu 13 vya Afrika mu mugambi wo gufashanya hagati y'Umuryango w'ibihugu vya Afrika (UA) n'ikompanyi y'itumatumanako MTN , nk'uko bivugwa na Peter Mwai wo mu gisata Reality Check ca BBC. Umuryango w'ibihugu vya Afrika waguze umuriyoni wa doze za  AstraZeneca zari muri Afrika y'Epfo yari yahagaritse gutanga kubera amakenga ko zitari gukinga ubwoko bushasha bwa Covid-19 bwari burwiriye muri ico gihugu. Ikigo Africa CDC caciye kizirungika mu bihugu mu mpera z'ukwa gatatu, hasigaye indwi nkeya ngo zite igihe. Nkengasong yavuze ko ikompanyi Serum Institute of India (SII) yahanuye Africa CDC ko "izi ncanco zishobora kubandanya zikoreshwa mu kiringo c'amezi icenda inyuma y'itariki ntarengwa". Umukuru wa OMS mu karere ka Afrika, Matshidiso Moeti , asaba ibihugu "kubika neza izi ncanco mu gihe tukibandanya twiga twongera tugerageza kurondera kumenya nimba izi ncanco zishobora gukoreshwa mu kiringo kirekire". Uretse Malawi na Sudani y'Epfo, OMS ivuga ko Ghana na Sierra Leone navyo nyene bitakoresheje incanco zose kubera zari zataye igihe. Umushikiranganji w'amagara y'abantu wa Sierra Leone avuga ko igihugu cari gisigaranye hafi ica gatatu ca doze cari cahawe. Austin Demby  yabwiye BBC ati:  "Twategerezwa gukora ibishoboka vyose tugakoresha izi ncanco". Ku bihugu 55 vya Afrika, 41 nivyo vyahawe incanco biciye mu mugambi mpuzamakungu Covax wo guhanahana izi ncanco. Hari ibindi indwi bikirindiriye kuronswa igice ca mbere. Umugambi wa Covax ufise intumbero yo gusaranganya incanco mu bihugu vyose ku rugero rungana, vyaba ibitunze canke ibikenye. Gushika ubu, doze zingana n'imiriyoni 38 nizo zimaze guhabwa ibihugu 98. Abahinga bavuga ko kugira ngo iki kiza karanda kirwanye ari uko incanco ziatangwa ku rugero rungana ku bihugu vyose kw'isi.

column2: Hari ibifungurwa bishobora kugabanya imyaka yawe yo kubaho n'ukukwononera amagara
column3: Urashobora kuvuga ubudasa buri hagati y'ibifungurwa bihingurwa buke buke n'ibindi vyaciye mu mahinguriro cane? Burya birateye ikibazo? Ijambo 'guhingura ibifungurwa'  rifise insiguro mbi muri iki gihe ca vuba, hari ivyigwa vyakozwe mu Bufaransa no muri Espagne vyerekana ko izo mfungurwa ataco zongera mu mubiri kandi zituma umuntu agabanya igihe co kubaho. Ubwo bushakashatsi bwerekanye ko abantu barya ibifungurwa bitegurigwa  mu mahinguriro incuro zine ku musi mu kiringo c'imyaka cumi bafise impungenge zo gupha zigera  kuri  mirongo itandatu na kabiri kw'ijana ugereranije n'abandi bafungura agace kamwe canke dukeyi ku musi. Izindi ngaruka mbi z'ibifungurwa bitekeye bikorerwa mu mahinguriro ni urugero runini rwo kugwara umutima canke uguhagara kw'umutima canke isanganya ry'udutsi dusoza ubwenge  bivuye ku ngwara y'umurindi w'amaraso urenze. Naho biruko, mu bihugu bimwe nk'Ubwongereza, abanyagihugu baronka ivyunyunyu birenga mirongo itanu kw'ijana biva ku bifungurwa bikorerwa mu mahinguriro. None twomenya gute ibifungurwa biteye ubwoba tugaheza tukamenya gafungura neza? Biragoye kumenya ibibigize rimwe na rimwe: Ibifungurwa nk'umukate n'iforomaje vyose bifatwa ko bitegurigwa mu mahinguriro ariko ntibitanga impanuka zimwe ku buzima. Igisata kijejwe amagara y'abantu muri Kaminuza ya Sao Paulo muri Bresile gishira ibifungurwa mu migwi ine. Iyi migwi iva ku bifungurwa bidahingurwa gushika ku bihingurwa cane. Uyu mugwi ugizwe n'ibifungurwa bidahingurwa na gato canke bihingurwa buke buke imbere yo gufungurwa, bigizwe n'ingaburo nk'amavitamine, ivyorosha mu nda n'ivyunyunyu. Uyu mugwi ugizwe n'ivyamwa bihiye, ibibogaboga, ibiyoba, intete, ibiharage, n'ibindi bifungurwa biva mu bikoko nk'amagi, amafi n'amata. Ibifungurwa vyahinduwe gatoyi bishobora kuba vyumye, vyoroshe cane , bishuhije buke buke ,  bikanye canke   ariko bitarimwo ibirungo. Murivyo harimwo kandi ivyamwa n'ibibogaboga bibisi, ifi mbisi  n'amata akanye  bizwi neza ko bitagiramwo isukari, amata, ipiripiri hamwe n'ibiboga vyumye. Ibifungurwa bitekeshejwe ibirungo harimwo amavuta, ayavyibusha nk'ayinka, vinegeri, isukari n'umunyu. Ntibivuga ko ibifungurwa nk'ivyo biribwa ukwavyo canke ari vyinshi cane, ariko kenshi biriribwa mu mugwi w'ibindi bifungurwa. Ibifungurwa bihingurwa bigizwe kenshi n'umugwi wongerwamwo ikirungo kimwe canke bibiri. Murivyo harimwo ibibabugwa nk'inyama y'impene, ingurube, umukate, ibiyoba birimwo umunyu canke isukari, ivyamwa birimwo inzoga cankeumuvinyu. Intumbero nyamukuru yo guhingura ibifungurwa ni kwongereza ikiringo bishobora kumara canke gukomeza akanovera cavyo. Ibifungurwa bihingurwa cane kenshi na kenshi birimwo ibirungo utoshobora kwongeramwo uri muhira uriko urabitegura. Ntushobora kubimenya amazina yavyo kubera birimwo ubumara, biriko amabara, ubusose canke ibindi bibikingira. Vyinshi mu bifungurwa bihingurwa cane biribwa n'abantu baba mu mu bihugu bitunze cane kw'isi ni: Igihe cose raba inyandiko ziri  ku gifungurwa: ibirungo bitandukanye na cane cane mugihe ibintu bikoreshwa mu mahinguriro akora ibifungurwa ategerezwa kwandika ko ibifungurwa vyahinguwe cane. Urwo rwandiko rushobora kubako ibirungo vyakoreshejwe birenga nka bitanu, nk'uko bivugwa n'umwigisha wa Kaminuza Maira Bes-Rastrollo, ari mu bakoze ico cigwa. Ibirungo bitaboneka bishobora kuba bihindura akanovera k'ico  gifungurwa. Vyinshi murivyo nta ngorane bitera ariko biravugwa ko bifise ingaruka mbi. Ni ukuraba neza ivyanditseko  ko vyerekana urugero rw'ivyunyunyu bivyibusha, isukari, ko umunyu ari  mwinshi, ugereranye canke ari mukeyi. Iyi nkuru yateguwe n'igisata ca BBC kijejwe ivy'ibifungurwa.

column2: Tottenham 0-2 Chelsea: Rudiger wa Chelsea avuga ko yatyojwe kubera ari umwirabure
column3: Ishirahamwe ry'abakinyi b'umupira w'amaguru mu Bwongereza (PFA ) risaba leta y'ico gihugu gukora amahotoza kw'ivangura rishingiye ku rukoba ryakorewe umukinyi wa Chelsea mu rukino rw'ejo ku wa Mungu . Vyabaye ngombwa ko umuhagarikizi w'urwo rukino Anthony Taylor ahagarika urukino umwanya muto  mu gice ca kabiri inyuma y'aho umukinyi w'inyuma wa Chelsea, umwirabure Antonio Rudiger amenyeshereje ko yariko yumva abantu bamuririmbira indirimbo zamwita ko ari inguge. Tottenham ivuga ko "izofata ingingo zikomeye zishoboka" kandi ko  izokora amatohoza "amatohoza akomeye". Iyo ngendo y'ivangura rishingiye ku rukoba yagiye kwibonekeza inyuma y'aho umukinyi w'imbere wa Tottenham Son Heung-min aherewe ikarata itukura  kw'ikosa yakoreye Rudiger  n'ibigirankana. Ibintu bikaba vyayangaye inyuma y'aho hari ibintu vyatewe umunyegori wa Chelsea Kepa Arrizabalaga. Inyuma y'aho umuhagarikizi ahagarikiye urukino, hasohowe itangazo mu kibuga ryagabisha ko "hari ingendo y'ivangura rishingiye ku rukoba ririko rirahungabanya urukino". Iryo tangazo ryasohowe incuro zitatu zose. PFA  ivuga ko yababajwe cane n'iryo tyozwa ryisubiriza mw'ihiganwa ry'umupira w'amaguru mu Bwongereza, Premier League. PFA ivuga iti: "Biraboneka ko abakinyi bariko bahura n'ingorane zikomeye z'ivangura rishingiye ku rukoba ririko rifata umurindi ukomeye mu Bwongereza, n'aho atari bo bonyene". "PFA yifatanije umubabaro n'umukinyi wese ariko ahura n'ibibazo vy'ivangura. Kw'izina ryabo, tuzobandanya urugamba rwo kurwanya ako kabi". "Football ni kimwe mu biranga Abongereza - hamwe n'isinzi ry'abakunzi bayo mu mpande zose z'isi, ni igikorwa cacu rero co kurwanya ako kabi ata kigongwe". PFA isaba "ibigo vyose vya leta" hamwe "n'abo bose bafise uruhara mu mupira w'amaguru" gukorera hamwe kugira ngo bahangane, barwanye kandi barandurane n'imizi ityozwa rishingiye ku rukoba mu bibuga eka no mu bindi bisata vy'igihugu. PFA isaba kandi leta gukora amatohoza ku bijanye n'ivangura rishingiye ku rukoba mu mupira w'amaguru. Ku ruhande rwayo, Tottenham imenyesha ko izokorana na Chelsea n'abakinyi bayo kugira bihwereze hamwe ivyashikiye umukinyi wa Chelsea. Mw'itangazo uyo murwi wasohoye, uvuga uti: "Ivangura iryo ari ryo ryose ntirishobora kwihanganirwa mu bibuga vyacu". "Ivyabaye tugiye kubikorerako n'ishaka rinini kandi tuzofatira ingingo ruhasha umuntu uwo ari we wese azoboneka ko yagize inyifato nk'iyo, harimwo n'ukumubuza gusubira kwinjira mu bibuga". Rudiger avuga ko ari ibintu bibabaje kubona hari abantu bakirangwa n'ivangura rishingiye ku rukoba mu rukino rw'umupira w'amaguru. Ati: "Ni ibiterasoni kubona mu mwaka wa 2019 hacibonekeza ivangura rishingiye ku rukoba. None ubu bujuju buzohera ryari?" Ivyashikiye Rudiger nijoro bibaye inyuma y'umwaka umukinyi wa Manchester City, Raheem Sterling na we nyene atyojwe kubera ari umwirabure kuri ico kibuga nyene ca Chelsea mu kwa 12 2018. Ivyo vyatumye umufana wa Chelsea umwe afatirwa ingingo yo kutazigera asubira kwinjira mu kibuga".

column2: Sead Kolasinac wa Arsenal yarwanye n'abasuma babiri
column3: Umukinyi w'umupira w'amaguru wo muri Bosnia akiniria ikipe ya Arsenal, ariko aritwa intwari ku mbuga hwaniro nyuma yo kugaragara atana mu mitwe n'abasuma babiri. Abo basuma bari biyoberanije bashaka kwiba imodoka izimvye uwo mukinyi na mugenzi wiwe bari barimwo. Sead Kolasinac yari atwawe mu modoka na rurangiranwa w'Umudage, Mesut Ozil, bari i London igihe ivyo vyaba. Video yagaragaye yerekana Kolasinac ata kirwanisho afise, ahangana n'abasuma babiri bari bambaye inkofero z'abagira kw'ipikipiki. Abo basuma kandi bari bitwje imbukiga, ariko nticabujije Kolasinac kubatesha bagata bakomoka. Ikipe ya Arsenal ivuga ko abo bakinyi bose bameze neza kandi ko ata n'umwe yakomeretse, igipolisi kikaba kiriko kirakora itohoza.

column2: Covid-19: urucanco Pfizer/BioNTech rwemejwe, rugiye gutangura gutangwa mu ndwi iza mu Bwongereza
column3: Ubwongereza ni co gihugu ca mbere kw'isi cemeje urucanco rw'ikigo Pfizer, BioNTech, mu ntambara yo kurwanya coronavirus, rukaba rugiye gutangura gutangwa ku bantu benshi. Ikigo c'Ubwongereza kijejwe kugenzura imiti MHRA, kivuga ko uru rucanco rukingira Covid-19 ku bice 95% ata ngorane ruteye. Igikorwa co gucandaga gishobora gutangura mu misi mike ku bantu barukeneye cane gusumba abandi, harimwo abatama n'abatamakazi hamwe n'ababangamiwe gusumba. Ubwongereza bumaze gutumako imiliyoni 40 z'uru rucanco kugira bashobore gucandaga abantu imiliyoni 20. Uru rucanco Pfizer/BioNTech ni rwo rwa mbere runyarutse kwemezwa, inyuma y'amezi cumi gusa mu gihe izindi zishobora gufata imyaka cumi. Umushikiranganji wa mbere Boris Johnson yanditse ku rubuga rwa Twitter ati: "Incanco ni zo zizoshobora kudufasha gusubirana ubuzima maze tugasubira mu bikorwa vy'iterambere". Umushikiranganji w'amagara y'abantu w'Ubwongereza, Matt Hancock, yabwiye BBC ko abanyagihugu bazohamagarwa n'ikigo NHS umwanya wabo wo gucandagwa ugeze. Umukuru w'igisata kijejwe amagara y'abantu, NHS, Sir Simon Stevens, avuga ko igisata kijejwe ubuvuzi kiriko kiritegurira "isekeza rikomeye ryo gucandaga mu mateka y'igihugu cacu". Hafi ibitaro 50 biragabirije, mu gihe hari ibindi bigo vy'ugucandaga biriko birategurwa. Hagati aho, abahinga bavuga ko n'aho izi ncanco zishobora gutangura, abanyagihugu bategerezwa kuba magabo, bakama bakurikiza amabwirizwa ajanye no guhagarika coronavirus. Ni ukuvuga kwirinda kwegerana, kwambara udupfukamunwa, kandi abafise ibimenyetso vy'uwu mugera bagapimwa mbere bagasabwa kwitandukanya n'abandi. Prof Danny Altman, umwigisha kuri kaminuza Imperial College London, avuga ko aya makuru y'iyemezwa ry'uru rucanco "akomeye cane". Ihinguriro Pfizer ryakoze uru rucanco rivuga ko iyi ari itsinzi ikomeye. Abahinga bakoze urutonde mfatakibanza rw'abantu babangamiwe gusumba abandi. Imbere y'abandi haza abasanzwe baba mu bigo vy'irerero n'ababikoramwo, abantu barenza imyaka 80 hamwe n'abandi bakozi bo mu gisata c'amagara y'abantu. Ni bo bazotangura guhabwa uru rucanco - bamwe mbere mu ndwi itangura. Mu nyuma uko imiti izogenda iboneka mu 2021, hazogenda haba isekeza ryo gucandaga abantu bose barengeje imyaka 50, hamwe n'abakiri bato basanzwe bafise izindi ndwara. Umuntu aterwa inshinge zibiri, hagati ya rumwe n'urundi hagategerezwa guca iminsi 21, uru rwa kabiri rukaba ari urwo kwongera inguvu. Haraca indwi nkeya kugira ngo urucanco rukore neza mu mubiri. Izindi ncanco za Covid ziteye he? Hari izindi ncanco zishobora kwemezwa mu minsi ya vuba. Hariho rumwe rwakozwe n'ikigo co muri Amerika Moderna rukora nk'urwa Pfizer. Ubwongereza bwaramaze kugura izishika imiliyoni indwi zishobora gushika  inyuma ya Pasika. Hari urundi rwahinguwe n'ikigo ca kaminuza ya Oxford gifadikanije na AstraZeneca, ikigo co mu Bwongereza nyene gihingura imiti, Ubwongereza bukaba bwaramaze gusaba izishika imiliyoni 100 zarwo. Uburusiya na bwo busanzwe buriko burakoresha urundi rwitwa Sputnik, mu gihe igisirikare c'Ubushinwa na co nyene camaze kwemeza urundi rwahinguwe n'ikigo CanSino Biologics. Izi zompi zikora co kimwe n'uru rucanco rwa Oxford.

column2: Ethiopia: Uko intambara yo muri Tigray yahindutse indwano yo hagati mu gihugu
column3: Intambara yo mu ntara ya Tigray yo mu buraruko bwa Ethiopia  ubu yahavuye iba indwano yo hagati mu gihugu iteye impungenge zo  kumanyagura ico gihugu no guhungabanya akarere kose. Abagararije ubutegetsi batumbereje ibitero berekeza mu bumanuko bagana umurwa mukuru mpuzantara, Addis Ababa, bituma umushikiranganji wa mbere Abiy Ahmed, yaronse agashimwe k'amahoro kitiriwe Nobel akaba yanahoze ari umusikirikare w'ipete rya lieutenant colonel - aja ku rugamba kuyobora ingabo z'igihugu. Aho indwano ikomereye gusumba vyaciye bituma abanyamahanga baturuka mu bihugu vya Buraya n'abakozi badakenewe cane ba ONU bava muri ico gihugu, bavuga ko umutekano wunyutse. Inyuma y'indwano yo mu gihugu mu myaka ya 1970 na 1980, Ethiopia yaciye iba kimwe mu bihugu vy'ubutunzi bwihuta cane kuduga muri Afrika, yongera iba inkingi  y'amaragamo mu karere. None ubu intureka ihitana abantu yakwiye igihugu iturutse mu karere k'abagarariji bo muri Tigray aho intambara yatanguriye, ikwira intara ya Amhara bihana urubibe mu buraruko bushira uburengero na Afar mu buraruko bushira ubuseruko. Intsinzi za vuba z'ingabo z'igihugu ku rugamba nta kinini zagize kugira zivaneho ubwoba  bw'indwano iguma ikomera aho imaze kugwamwo abantu ibihumbi , abaharurwa muri za miriyoni nabo bagateshwa izabo. Umugambwe Tigray People's Liberation Front (TPLF)  wagararije ubutegetsi uvuga ko  ibitero vyawo vyo mu bumanuko bigamije kugondoza reta kugira ireke ukwugarana intara ya Tigray kwatumye ugutumatumanako no gushikira imfashanyo y'abari mu kaga bigorana cane. Ariko, ubutegetsi bwa Abiy bwagirije  abagararije gukwiragiza bakoresheje ibigwanisho ko hakenewe ko intwaro ihinduka, bigarukana ubwoba ko TPLF  ishaka kugaruka ku butegetsi. TPLF yamaze imyaka 27  yiganziye urubuga rwa poritike muri Ethiopia inyuma yo gushoza intanbara y'ubugarariji nk'iyo y'ubu mu 1991  kuri reta ya gi-komunista. Ubutegetsi bwabo bwashikanye igihugu kw'iyubakwa ry'ibikorwa remezo vyinshi vyadugije cane ubutunzi bwa Ethiopia, ariko buca burangwa n'agacinyizo ka poritike n'imibano. Ico ca nyuma nico cateye imyiyerekano yo kwanka reta yatumye Abiy ashika ku butegetsi muri Ndamukiza (ukwezi kwa 4) mu 2018 aho yaca atanguza impinduka z'imibano, poritike n'umutekano. Mu kurwanya iyo reta, TPLF yaciye yunga ubucuti bwo gukomeza ubushobozi bwayo bwo kugwana no kwongereza igihagararo cayo inyuma yo gushigikirwa n'imigambwe ishingiye ku bwoko itavuga rumwe n'umushikiranganji wa mbere. Iyo ntambara ubwa mbere yari hagati ingabo za TPLF n'ingabo z'igihugu, zishigikiwe n'utugwi tw'abigenza nk'abagwanyi  two muri Amhara  hamwe n'ingabo za Eritrea. Indongozi za TPLF  zaromowe mu minsi mike, ariko ubugarariji bwariko burarandagata muri Tigray hagati, bwunyura ibintu vyari bisanzwe bimeze nabi ku buryo abantu babayeyo. Abantu barenga 90% y'ababa muri iyo ntara -bashika miriyoni 5,2 - bakeneye imfashanyo yihuta, nk'uko ONU ibigereranya. Abaharurwa mu bihumbi barahungiye mu gihugu kibanyi ca Sudan -naco gisanzwe kiri mu bibazo  bijanye  n'itembagazwa ry'ubutegetsi. Inyeshamba zahuje umwanya wo gufata umurwa mukuru w'intara Mekelle mu kwezi kwa gatandatu n'igihe Ethiopia yari irindiriye ibiva mu matora kugira bahungabanye ukwemerwa kwa Abiy Ahmed. Inyeshamba zimaze  gushikana intambara hakurya y'imbibe za Tigray, imigwi yitwara nk'ingabo yo mu ntara zishingiye ku moko zirimwo Somali na Oromia yaciye yinjiramwo. Akamo umushikiranganji wa mbere Abiy yagumye atera k'uko abantu bafata ibigwanisho kugira batangire inyeshamba katumye  ikoreshwa ry'ibigwanisho rirushirizaho guhabwa ikibanza. Mw'itangazo ryahavuye rifutwa kuri Facebook ku wa 4 Munyonyonyo (ukwezi kwa 11) kubera  ryashobora kugumura, Abiy yavuze ati: "Ni inshingano z'umwe umwe muri twebwe gupfira Ethiopia. Nico gituma abantu bategerezwa kubanza gushira ivyabo ku ruhande hanyuma bitunganye mu buryo bwemewe hanyuma baje ahabona n'ikigwanisho cose n'ubushobozi bashobora kuronka kugira bazibire kandi bahambe abaterabwoba ba TPLF, biyemeje gusambura." Intumbero y'igihugu ya Abiy yerekanye intege nke zikiri mu ntwaro y'intara nyinshi zishingiye ku moko  zigahurira kuri reta imwe , nk'uko biri mw'ibwirizwa nshingiro ryo mu 1994. N'ubwo iryo bwirizwa nshingiro ryarondera kwongera imigwi y'amoko uburenganzira bwo gutunganya ivy'intara zayo, imwe imwe yabandanije gahunda zo kurondera kuronka ubwigenge bwuzuye kuva Abiy ashitse ku butegetsi. Mu kwezi kw'umunani, TPLF yagiraniye urunani n'umuhari w'abitwaje ibigwanisho ba Oromo (Oromo Liberation Army, OLA) wo mu bwoko nyamwinshi muri Ethiopia ariko bwagumye bukumirwa n'intwaro zari zagiye zirakurikirana. Abiy niwe yabaye uwa mbere wo mu bwoko bw'aba Oromo yagiye mu kibanza c'umushikiranganji wa mbere. Ariko reta imaze gufata igapfunga abanyeporitike bakomeye b'aba-Oromo, OLA yaciye ikora ikomeza kutavuga rumwe n'umushikiranganji wa mbere. .  Urunani rwa OLA na TPLF rwatumye abagwanya reta bafata ibisagara bikomakomeye muri Amhara -harimwo Kemise, Dessie na Kombolcha - uko baguma basugereza umurwa mukuru. Ugusugereza umurwa mukuru kwaranakomejwe no gushigikirwa n'iyindi migwi ya poritike n'iyitwaje ibigwanisho icenda, na cane cane ishingiye mu mahanga yakangisha gukura umushikiranganji wa mbere. Reta ya Ethiopia kuva ico gihe imaze gutangaza ko yaguruje bimwe mu bisagara vyari vyafashwe n'abayirwanya. Abizeye ibiganiro barazerutse Itariki indwi za Munyonyo (ukwezi kwa 11) , intumwa y'ishirahamwe rya Africa (AU), uwahoze ari umukuru wa Nigeria Olusegun Obasanjo, yari yatanze  icizere  ko impande zirwana zari zugurukiye ibiganiro. Ariko inyeshamba n'umushikiranganji wa mbere  Abiy bakomeje guterana ibidashika. Umukuru wa TPLF Debretsion Gebremichael haheze iminsi ibiri abonanye n'intumwa y'ishirahamwe rya Afrika yavuze ati: "Ingabo z'akagwi k'abatwaza igitugu zahumbahumbwe. Ubu rero zirindiriye guhambwa nk'abandi bose batwaza umukazo, kandi ivyo bizoba vuba." Mu kwishura, umushikiranganji wa mbere Abiy nawe yavuze ati izo nyeshamba "zizokwicwa rubi  vuba". Muri uwo mwanya nyene,  kwotswa igitutu n'akarere vyaragaganutse, akamo k'amakungu k'ibiganiro nako kabonwa nko kwivanga mu biraba Ethiopia. Ukuba ishirahamwe rya Afrika ataho ryegamiye -rifise icicaro caryo muri Ethiopia -  nakwo hari abagufiseko  amakenga. Ivyo vyabaye na cane cane inyuma y'inyandiko yaryo kuri Twitter mu kwezi kw'umunani, kuva ico gihe ryaciye rivanwako, ryanegura akamo ka Amerika ko gusaba ko haba ibiganiro. Imyiyerekano yo kwiyamiriza Amerika n'ibindi bihugu vy'i Buraya n'ibinyamakuru vyo mu mahanga yagumye yiyongera i Addis Ababa no mu banya-Ethiopia baba hanze.

column2: Umunonotsi Francine Niyonsaba avuga ko atawuzomubuza guhiganwa
column3: Umunonotsi w'Umurundikazi, Francine Niyonsaba, ahiganwa mu gusiganwa imetero 800, yabwiye BBC ko ata n'umwe ashobora kumubuza kubandanya ahiganwa. Ibi ni nyuma y'aho urwego mpuzamakungu rujejwe inkino zo kunonora imitsi rutegekeye ko abagore bafise imisemburo ya kigabo irenze urugero mu mubiri, bagomba gufata imiti iyigabanya. Mu banonotsi iyo ngingo iraba harimwo Francine Niyonsaba hamwe na Caster Semenya wo muri Afrika y'epfo, ariko iyo ngingo yajanywe muri sentare. Avugana na BBC mu gihe ikinyamakuru Forbes giheruka kumushira ku rutonde rw'abagore 30 bahambaye muri Afrika, Francine yavuze ko azobandanya ahiganwa mu kunonora imitsi, uko vyogenda kwose. Yavuze ko iyo ngingo yo gushaka kubakumira irimwo akarenganyo gakomeye. Francine avuga ko icatumye agira ishaka ryo kurondera ari uko yakuriye mu buzima bugoye. Yagize ati: "Jewe nakuze mpabwa ibintu bike mu buzima, nakuriye mu muryango ukenye. Sinaronse amahirwe yo kubana n'abavyeyi bose, ivyo rero vyarankujije mu mutwe." "... ndabona yuko ntegerezwa kurwana n'ubuzima. Umuvyeyi wanje nawe nyene yarampaye icitegererezo gikomeye kuri we kuko yarambwira ati 'mwana mu buzima ntacoroshe..." Francine yabaye Umurundi agira kabire muri kahise k'ico gihugu yaronse umudari mu nkino Olempike, aho yaronka umudari w'umwakaka mu nkino zo mu 2016 muri Brezil, mu kwiruka imetero 800. Uwundi ni Venuste Niyongabo, yaronse umudari w'inzahabu mu gusiganwa imetero 1500 mu nkino Olempike z'i Atlanta muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika mu 1996. Ku ngingo y'uko yobuzwa guhiganwa kubera ico kibazo c'imisemburo, Francine yagize ati "Nifuza yuko umwanya nkifise hano kw'isi abantu batovuga ngo harabaye ntihakabe, bovuga bati harabaye harakaba." Ushobora gukurikirana ikiganiro Francine Niyonsaba yagiranye na BBC ukanze ngaha.

column2: Ibanki nkuru y’u Burundi igabisha amashirahamwe acuruza amafaranga atisunze amategeko
column3: Umuyobozi w'igisata kijejwe kugenzura amabanki mw'ibanki nkuru y'igihugu c'u Burundi, Prosper Ngendanganya, asaba amashirahamwe acuruza amafaranga kwubahiriza amategeko yashinzwe n'ibanki nkuru y'igihugu. Ni inyuma y'umubonano hagati y'iyo banki n'amashirahamwe agura akagurisha amafaranga wabaye  ku munsi wa kane w'iyi ndwi mu ntumbero y'ukwibutsa ayo mashirahamwe amategeko mashasha n'igituma adakurikizwa. Ku wa 17 z'ukwezi kw'icenda uno mwaka, ibanki nkuru y'igihugu, BRB, yasohoye itegeko rishasha rigenga urucuruza rw'amafaranga mu ntumbero y'ukurwanya abikika mu kiza bakagura bakanagurisha ku biciro vy'umurengera amafaranga y'agaciro. Mw'itangazo yasohoye ejo ku wa gatanu, bwana Ngendakumana yaragabishije ko amashirahamwe n'amazu acuruza amafaranga y'agaciro adakurikije amategeko azofatwa nk'ayahungabanya umutekano w'igihugu. Avuga ko ishirahamwe rizofatwa ririko riragurisha ibiciro ry'ishakiye ko rizofatwa nk'umwansi w'igihugu kandi ko rizohanwa hisunzwe igatabu mpanavyaha. Ibanki nkuru y'igihugu imenyesha kandi ko urudandazwa rutemewe n'amategeko (marché noir) rw'amafaranga y'agaciro rwasubiye kwibonekeza cane cane mu gisagara ca Bujumbura. BRB ikababazwa n'uko ayo mashirahamwe adashaka gufasha mu kwerekana abo badandaza bo mu kinyegero bakora batubahiriza ibiciro biba vyashinzwe na BRB. Mu rugamba rwo kurwanya urudandazwa ruteye kubiri n'amategeko, ibanki nkuru y'igihugu yaremereye agashirukabute umuntu azoshobora kwerekana ishirahamwe canke inzu izogura canke izogurisha amafaranga y'agaciro hatisunzwe iryo tegeko rishasha, aho azoronswa ibihumbi 500 vy'amafaranga y'amarundi. Ni mu gihe uwuzokwerekana umuntu canke ishirahamwe rikora ritazwi n'ibanki nkuru y'igihugu nawe azorosnwa ibice 10 kw'ijana (10%) vy'amafaranga yose azoba afashwe. Kuva Uburundi bwinjiye mu ngorane za politike mu mwaka wa 2015, ibihugu bimwe bimwe vyahora bifasha u Burundi vyahagaritse imfashanyo vyahora biha ico gihugu, ivyagize ingaruka mbi ku butunzi bwaco, bituma kani amafaranga y'agaciro akena.

column2: Bazamuganga: Uburwayi bwa Fibromes Uterins bumeze gute?
column3: Abagore n'abigeme bageze mu myaka yo kwibaruka barashobora  kugira ikibazo c'ibivyimba mu bice vy'igitereko/ Fibromes Uterins Ibi bivyimba bikunda kuboneka ku birabure gusumba ayandi moko (mu bazungukazi bifata abagera ku bice 20% nayo mu birabure barenga 50%). Ni ingwara kuri bamwe itera ububabare bukomeye cane, n'aho ata vyinshi bivugwa ku bushakashatsi bwo kumenya impamvu zavyo n'ingene vyokwirindwa. Forentine Kwizera avugana na Muganga Thierry Mako, yanonosoye gukwirikirana abavyeyi (Gyneco-obstetricien), atangura amubaza uburyo ivyo bivyimba bimenyekana ku wubifise (umviriza ikiganiro aho hejuru).
